[\[33b.1\]]'khrul pa bskyed par mi bya'o/_/'dis ni phan yon 'di yi ge dang don gyi gzungs kyi yin par bstan to/_/gzungs 'di'i phan yon sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul 'dzin pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir/_gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_ston pa'i gsung

[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]rtse gcig byas nas su/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran byed pa/_/de ni cho ga bzhin du bsgom/_/bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pa'i phyir/_sgra med pa'i sa phyogs su skyil mo krung bcas nas/_dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba dag bstud par mi bya bar/_lus drang por
[\[34a.2\]]bsrang la/_ha cang ma rengs par bya ste/_sems kyi tshogs phyi rol du 'phro ba bzlog pa'i phyir/_sems sna'i rtse mo la gtad de ci nus kyis bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas/_skyo bar gyur na blo can gyis/_/der gnas sems kyis dus bstud do/_/ha cang bsgom drags pas rnal 'byor pa
[\[34a.3\]]sems skyo bar gyur na/_bsgom pa de las langs la klog 'don bya ba'am/_'greng ba'am/_'gro ba'am/_zan za ba'am/_bya ba gzhan ci yang rung ba byed cing skyo ba med par ma gyur gyi bar du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la gnas pa'i sems kyis dus bstud par bya ste/_skyo ba med par
[\[34a.4\]]gyur nas kyang bsgom par bya'o/_/blo ldan de ltar sgom byed pa/_/de ltar zhag bdun tha mar ni/_/sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu rnams/_/de yi 'og tu gzungs sbyin mdzad/_/ci'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de snyed kyis de la gzungs sbyin par mdzad ce na/_smras pa/_gsang sngags
[\[34a.5\]]tshig ni re re zhing /_/sangs rgyas bye bas byin brlabs la/_/des kyang sngar ni de dag gis/_/bzlas bsrung la sogs phun tshogs byas/_/'di ltar gsang sngags kyi tshig brgyad cu po rnams sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cus byin gyis brlabs la/_gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis kyang
[\[34a.6\]]rnal 'byor pa des bzlas brjod byed par gyur pas/_bsrung ba dang /_mdangs dang /_stobs dang /_nad med pa la sogs pa phun sum tshogs par byas pa'i phyir te/_bsgom pa'i snga rol du bzlas brjod bya ba'i sgo nas ci nus su gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod la/_de'i 'og tu
[\[34a.7\]]bsgom par bya'o/_/gang gi phyir de lta yin pa/_/de'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba ni/_/brgyad cus de la gzungs sbyin mdzad/_/yang na dgu bcu las thos ltar/_/bsgoms mthu de ni 'di 'dra'o/_/yang na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i mthu nyid 'di 'dra ste/_des sangs rgyas bye ba
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]phrag brgyad cus de la gzungs sbyin par mdzad do/_/dper na 'di nyid las sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa thos so zhes yang dang yang du gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/gzungs de rnam pa ji lta bur bsams na thob par 'gyur zhe na/_smras pa/_gzugs sogs
[\[34b.2\]]bsam pa bsam bya yin/_/gzugs med sogs pa bsam bya min/_/yang na sprul pa bsam bya yin/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa bsam bya min/_/yang na bsam bya bsam bya min/_/bya bsam bya min dngos bsam bya/_/gzod nas ma skyes pas med phyir/_/bsam pa de dag bsam mi
[\[34b.3\]]bya/_/gzugs la sogs pa la bsam pa ni bsam bya min pa ste/_de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo yin pas don gyi bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir/_bsam par bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sogs pa smos pas ni mtshan la sogs pa sngar bstan pa rnams nyid gzung ngo /_/yang na sprul
[\[34b.4\]]pa'i sku la bsam pa gang yin pa de ni bsam par bya ba yin te/_de ni skye ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis bsam par bya bar nus pa'i phyir ro/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la bsam pa gang yin pa de ni bsam par bya ba ma yin pa ste/_de ni skye ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis bsam par mi
[\[34b.5\]]nus pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam pa gzhan yang bsam par bya ba bsam par nus pa'i dngos po la bsam pa gang yin pa de ni bsam par bya ba yin no/_/bsam par bya ba ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi chos la sogs pa dag la bsam pa yin pa de ni bsam par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/gzod ma nas
[\[34b.6\]]ma skyes pas gzugs la sogs pa med pa'i phyir/_bsam pa de dag ni bsam par mi bya'o/_/ji ltar chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes pa de lta na sngar bstan zin to/_/'o na ci zhig soms shig ce na/_smras pa chos kyi dbyings soms shig_/de la yang log par bsam par mi bya'o/_/
[\[34b.7\]]chos kyi dbyings ji ltar bsam zhe na/_ji ltar yang 'gal bar yang ma sems shig_/ci'i phyir de lta zhe na/_'di ltar rnam pa gang dang gang gis chos kyi dbyings sems par byed pa rnams de dang de med pa'i phyir ro/_/stong pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa la sogs pa ni/_don dam
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]par na dgag par bya ba med pa la dgag pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir med pa kho na ste/_de lta bas na chos kyi dbyings de la yang bsam par mi bya ste/_log par bsam par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/'gal bar sems pa ni skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang /
[\[35a.2\]]dngos po la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang /_dngos po tha dad pa nyid dang /_gcig pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa rnam par sems pa ste/_gang gi dbang du mdzad nas/_gang stong pa nyid du lta ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/rnal 'byor pas ji skad bstan pa'i
[\[35a.3\]]rnam pa kho nas/_de ltar zhag bdun sems na ni/_/de yi 'og tu gzungs thob 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang yang du bshad pas ci zhig bya snyam du dgongs nas/_dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_phan yon 'di ni gzungs rnam pa gsum char gyi yin no/_/bde
[\[35a.4\]]ba ni nges par legs pa dang mngon par mtho ba'i bde ba'o/_/som nyi ni the tshom za zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/de ltar phan yon rnam pa du ma bstan nas/_'bras bu nye ba gtso bo bstan pas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten gzungs 'di la 'jug cing mjug sdud par mdzad de/_'di las rdzogs
[\[35a.5\]]pa'i byang chub nye/_/de bas 'di la sbyor bar gyis/_/thos pa la sogs pa'am/_lus la sogs pa'am/_'og nas bzhi tshan bstan pa rnams kyis sbyar bar bya ste/_'dis ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang /_spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa
[\[35a.6\]]gnyis bstan te/_byang chub ni ye shes dang spangs pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_ma 'bad par mkhyen pa dang /_ma bstan par mkhyen pa'o/_/spangs pa yang
[\[35a.7\]]rnam pa bzhi ste/_nyon mongs pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang /_gtan du spangs pa dang /_bag chags dang bcas par spangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste/_de dag kyang rdzogs pa'i byang chub smos pas bstan to/_/
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]khyed/_zhi ba'i gnas ni thob gyur nas/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed 'gyur/_/'jig rten no snyam du dgongs pa ste/_'dis ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan par rig par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i gnas ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/
[\[35b.2\]]me gsum zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/_mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rnam pa gsum po ste/_'dis ni byang chub gsum la 'god pa'i gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/_/ngan song gsum las nges par thar pa dang /_mtho ris su
[\[35b.3\]]'god pa dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las gtan du rnam par thar pa ni shugs kyis bstan par shes par bya'o/_/yang na ci'i phyir/_'di las rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye zhe na/_'di ltar khyed/_zhi ba'i gnas ni thob gyur nas/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[35b.4\]]zhes bya ba 'dis nye ste/_tshigs su bcad pa ril po 'dis ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/_/da ni de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzungs 'di 'thob pa'i thabs bstan te/_blo ldan ci 'dra gang du dang /_/ji ltar gnas dang gang bsgoms dang /_/
[\[35b.5\]]gang byas pas ni 'thob 'gyur ba/_/de ni bzhi tshan rnams kyis bstan/_/rnal 'byor pa ji lta bus gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ba de ni bzhi tshan dang pos bstan to/_/gang du gnas pa dang /_ji ltar gnas pa de gnyis ni gnyis pas bstan to/_/gang sgom pa dang /_gang bya ba
[\[35b.6\]]de gnyis ni gsum pas bstan to/_/rnal 'byor pa ji lta bus gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur zhe na/_smras pa/_khrims ldan de yi mi mthun phyogs/_/gnyis grol de yi 'phel byed ldan/_/nyes pa dang ni phan yon rnams/_/bstan pas de la 'dzud par byed/_/'dod pa rnams
[\[35b.7\]]la lhag par chags pa med pa zhes bya bas ni tshul khrims dang ldan par bstan te/_tshul khrims ni yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi yin no/_/'dod pa lnga'i yon tan rnams lhag par chags pa med na/_srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi byed do/_/de lta bas na de spangs pa'i
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]mtshan nyid kyi tshul khrims kyang thob pa nyid pas logs shig tu ma bstan to/_/tshul khrims kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs phrag dog dang ser sna las grol ba ni/_sems can thams cad la phrag dog med pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing 'gyod pa med
[\[36a.2\]]pa yin zhes bya ba 'dis bstan to/_/phrag dog dang ser sna dag ni tshul khrims kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams yin te/_'di ltar 'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags na phrag dog byed pa dang /_ser sna byed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la zhes smos pa ni/_dgra bo dang mdza'
[\[36a.3\]]bo dang tha mal pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro/_/bdog pa thams cad ces smos pa ni phyi rol dang nang gi bsdu ba'i phyir ro/_/'gyod pa med pa zhes smos pa ni sems la 'dzin pa med pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir te/_tshig 'di gsum gyis ni tshul khrims shin tu rnam par dag pa bstan to/_/'gyod pa
[\[36a.4\]]med par sbyin pa'i tshul can ni yid la gcags pa med par sbyin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba yin te zhes bya ba 'dis ni tshul khrims 'phel bar byed pa gang dag dang ldan pa nyid bstan to/_/chos la sred pa'i phyir chos 'dod par 'gyur
[\[36a.5\]]ro/_/nan tan byed pas ni chos la dga'o/_/yang na chos rnams la 'jug phyir chos 'dod do/_/goms pa'i phyir chos la dga'o/_/yang na nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la sogs par brtson pa'i phyir chos 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos bsgom pa'i phyir
[\[36a.6\]]chos la dga'o/_/yang na gnyis su nges par gzung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_'dis ni rtog pa ngan pa med pa'i phyir don gyis na/_'khrig pa'i sbyor ba bdun dang bral ba'i tshul khrims bstan to/_/nyes pa dang phan yon bstan pa'i rgyus tshul khrims la sogs pa de dag la 'dzud de/_gdul
[\[36a.7\]]ba zhes bya ba'i tshig lhag ma'o/_/de yang tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bstan to/_/de la rnam pa lngas tshul khrims la 'dzud de/_'dod pa rnams kyi nyes pa bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa la/_dri nga ba ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na 'dod pa'i rtsa ba lus kyi
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]mi gtsang ba'i dri dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/ngan pa ni thams cad kyi tha chad du gyur pa'i phyir dang /_sems can ngan pas bsten pa'i phyir dang /_dam pa rnams kyis smad pa'i phyir dang /_bum pa mi gtsang ba can la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir dang /_'bras bu ngan pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[36b.2\]]bdud kyi spyod yul ni bdud kyi yul las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/bdud ni lha'i bu'am/_'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'am/_gnyis ka'o/_/sems can dmyal ba'i rkyen ni de 'grub par byed pa dang /_de 'grub par 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar
[\[36b.3\]]'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sems can dmyal ba smos pa ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te/_dud 'gro dang yi dgas gnyis kyi rkyen yang 'dod pa rnams yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ngan song gi rgyu ni ma rungs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te/_'dod phyir 'jig rten bcing dang bsad par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la
[\[36b.4\]]sogs pa 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/yang na ngan song gi rgyu ni ngan song gsum gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sems can dmyal ba smos pa ni gtso bor bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs phrag dog spong ba la 'dzud pa ni/_phan yon bstan pa'i phyir rnam pa lngas bstan te/_spang bar bya ba'i rang
[\[36b.5\]]bzhin bstan pa dang /_spang bar bya ba'i yul bstan pa dang /_spang bar bya ba'i rgyu bstan pa la/_rgyu de yang shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa dang grags pa'i bye brag las rnam pa gsum du bstan to/_/shes kyi khe ni kun du bstan pas 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_dga'
[\[36b.6\]]ba'i mig ni dga' bas lta ba ste/_khro ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/de spang ba'i phan yon bstan pa de yang rnam pa gnyis te mthu che ba thob pa/_nor dang 'khor la sogs 'byor ba 'thob pa'i phyir dang /_gzugs mdzes pa 'thob pa yan lag dang nying lag
[\[36b.7\]]gi gzugs mdzes pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ser sna spang ba la 'jug pa ni/_nyes pa dang phan yon bstan phyir rnam pa bzhis bstan te/_nyes dmigs bstan pa ni rtsod pa ste lus la sogs pa'i bya ba gnod pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de'i rgyu bstan pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa ste/
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pas dngos por 'dzin pa'o/_/gzhi rtsa smos pas ni dngos dang brgyud pa'i rgyu'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i don te/_'di yang yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du gnod pa'i rgyu yin par bstan pas gdul ba rnams de las 'dun pa bzlog
[\[37a.2\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/sred pa'i yul yongs su spang ba ni spang ba ste/_de la lhag par chags pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i phan yon bstan pa ni/_gzungs zhes bya ba ste/_gzungs 'di nyid yin no/_/de yang dus gzhan la dgongs te gsungs so/_/de 'phel bar byed pa la 'jug pa ni/
[\[37a.3\]]phan yon bstan pa'i phyir rnam pa lngas bstan te/_chos tshol ba ni chos ni stong pa nyid dang /_de ston pa'i yi ge'o/_/de 'dri ba ni 'dri ba la sogs pa'i rim pa ste/_de'i phyir/_yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin pa dang /_/klog dang nyan dang 'dzin pa dang /_/ston dang kha ton byed pa dang /_/sems
[\[37a.4\]]dang bsgom pa gang yin pa/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/rgyun mi chad par tshol ba ni las ngan pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir ro/_/gzhan mi sems par tshol ba ni log par rnam par rtog pa yongs su spang ba dang /_mtho ris la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa rnam par rtog
[\[37a.5\]]pa yongs su spong ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub 'dod cing tshol ba ni de byang chub kyi rgyu yin par bstan pa'i phyir byang chub kyi rgyu gzungs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/chos tshig ni stong pa nyid dang /_/de ston pa'i mdo sde la sogs pa'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa dang po las ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi
[\[37a.6\]]nyes pa 'ba' zhig bstan la/_gnyen po'i yon tan ni ma bstan/_gnyis pa dang tha ma las ni gnyen po'i yon tan 'ba' zhig bstan la/_mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi nyes pa ma bstan/_gsum pa las ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang /_gnyen po gnyi ga'i yon tan dang skyon
[\[37a.7\]]bstan pa ma yin nam/_ci'i phyir de ltar bstan zhe na/_de ni gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs gnyis kyi yon tan dang nyes pa bstan pa gud du gces pa yod do/_/de'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa dang po la ni/_'dod pa'i gnyen po'i tshul khrims dri zhim po bsten par bya'o zhes
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]bya ba la sogs pas yon tan yang blta bar bya'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa dang /_bzhi pa dag la yang de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi nyes pa yang blta bar bya'o/_/sngar bstan pa yi don nyid ni/_/chos kyi rjes 'brang ched du ste/_/rigs pa phan yon bye brag gis/_/tshigs bcad rnams kyis yang bstan to/_/
[\[37b.2\]]rnam pa gzhan yang sngar bstan pa'i don nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_zhar la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i dbang du yang mdzad de/_rigs pa dang phan yon gyi bye brag gi rgyus/_yang tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstan te/_'di ltar 'dod pa rnams spang ba'i phyir ni dri nga ba la
[\[37b.3\]]sogs pa'i rigs pa gsungs so/_/phrag dog mi bya ba'i phyir ni mthu che ba la sogs pa thob pa'i phan yon gsungs la/_de mi bya ba'i phyir 'bras bu khyad par can 'thob po zhes rgyu yang gsungs so/_/ser sna'i rgyu sred pa'i yul yongs su spang ba'i phyir ni rgyu rtsod pa gsungs so/_/rtsa ba
[\[37b.4\]]bzhi pas ni phan yon bstan to/_/tshul khrims 'phel bar byed pa'i chos bstan pa'i phyir ni 'bras bu khyad par can 'thob po zhes rgyu smos la/_phan yon ni dngos su bstan pa nyid do/_/da ni gang du gnas pa dang /_ji ltar gnas pa de bstan pa'i phyir/_gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
[\[37b.5\]]gsungs te/_dgon sogs gnas shing zab mo yi/_/chos rnams la ni legs par spyod/_/rnyed dang bkur sti tshigs bcad la/_/lhag par chags med brtul zhugs can/_/rtag tu sdug pa'i dngos po kun/_/'bras bu la ni mi lta ba'am/_/'dzin med sems kyis gtong byed pas/_/
[\[37b.6\]]gzungs 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba yin/_/gong du gnas pa zhes bya ba de/_dgon pa dang /_g.ye'i tshig gis bstan te/_lus kyi 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs pas 'du ba'i nyes pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir ro/_/dgon pa ni grong nas 'dom lnga brgya phan chad do/_/g.ye ni de bas kyang ring ba'o/_/
[\[37b.7\]]sogs pa smos pa ni dbye bsdu'o/_/ji ltar gnas pa de ni log par rnam par rtog pa'i nyes pa dang /_'du 'dzi yongs su spang pa'i phyir/_rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te/_des ni lus dang sems ngag gis bsrings na chos gang bskyed mi nus pa de 'ga' yang med do snyam du dgongs pa'o/_/
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]chos zab mo la spyod pa ni chos zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa ste/_chos zab mo dag la bzod pa ni 'dod pa'o/_/de'i stobs bskyed pa ni chen po la sogs pa'i rim pa bskyed pa'o/_/de'i dngos po ni chos zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs
[\[38a.2\]]bskyed pa de nyid do/_/yang na chos la bzod pa zab mo zhes bya bar shes par bya ste/_yul zab pa'i phyir de yang zab pa'o/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la lhag par chags pa med pa ni/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la lhag par chags pa
[\[38a.3\]]med ces gsungs pa gang yin pa ste/_tshigs su bcad pa ni grags pa'o/_/lhag par chags pa med pa ni mngon par zhen pa med pa'o/_/rtag tu sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad mi lta ba yongs su gtong ba ni sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar yongs su gtong zhes gsungs pa
[\[38a.4\]]gang yin pa ste/_thams cad smos pa ni phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir ro/_/mi lta bar gtong ba ni mtho ris dang /_lan du phan 'dogs pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu la mi lta bar yongs su gtong ba'i phyir ram/_'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong bas na sdug pa'i dngos po thams
[\[38a.5\]]cad la mi lta bar yongs su gtong ba zhes bya ste/_btang ngam mi btang snyam pa la sogs pa'i nem nur dang /_le lo la sogs pa'i 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/cher na lus dang srog kyang zhes bya ba ni/_bu la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi snyam du dgongs pa'o/_/lus dang srog
[\[38a.6\]]gtong ba ni nang gi yin pas dka' ba'i phyir de gnyis smos so/_/bu la sogs pa gtong ba ni phyi rol gyi yin pa'i phyir sla'o/_/lus gtong ba ni lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs pa gtong ba'i phyir ro/_/lus thams cad gtong na srog gtong ba yin no/_/dang po gnas yin de nas las/_/de
[\[38a.7\]]nas rnyed sogs tshol ba spong /_/der yang ma zad thams cad la/_/mi lta ba yang gtong bar byed/_/bzhi tshan 'di'i don go rims bzhin du bstan par bya ste/_gnas med par bsgom du mi rung ba'i phyir/_re zhig thog mar dgon pa la sogs pa gnas gsungs so/_/der gnas nas
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]kyang zhing la sogs pa'i las ni mi bya'o/_/las 'di lta bu bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir/_gnas kyi 'og tu chos zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa gsungs so/_/gnas dang las de dag gis rnyed pa la sogs pa btsal ba spang bar bya'o/_/de lta ma yin na dgon par gnas pa dang /_chos
[\[38b.2\]]zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa don med par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir/_las kyi 'og tu rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la lhag par chags pa med pa gsungs so/_/phyi rol gyi yan lag rnyed pa la sogs pa dag la lhag par chags par mi bya bar yang ma zad
[\[38b.3\]]kyi/_sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad la yang mi lta bar spang ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir/_de'i 'og tu sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar yongs su gtong ba zhes gsungs so/_/sngar bstan pa'i don nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ched du gtan tshigs dang phan yon gyi bye brag
[\[38b.4\]]gis/_tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis yang gsungs te/_rgyal bas bsngags pa'i zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs bstan pa'o/_/dgon par gnas par gyis zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ni nyes pa dang bdud kyi dgra thams cad las rgyal bas na rgyal ba'o/_/des
[\[38b.5\]]bsngags pa ni 'du 'dzi la sogs pa'i nyes pa yongs su spong ba'i phyir dang /_yon tan skye ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro/_/bsgrub par bya ba dang /_sgrub pa'i dbang gis dpe brtag par bya'o/_/bdag ni dgon pa na gnas pa'o snyam pa la sogs pas mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pas/_de na gnas
[\[38b.6\]]pas gzhan la brnyas mi bya/_de lta na dgon pa de rgyal bas bsngags pa yin gyi/_de lta ma yin na ni de rgyal bas smad pa kho na yin no/_/'di ltar/_rgyal bas bsngags pa'i dgon par gnas par gyis/_/zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so/_/de na gnas pas gzhan la brnyas mi bya ba ni dam

[\[39a.1\]]ni dam bca' ba'o/_/bde bar gshegs pas bsngags pa ni gtan tshigs so/_/zab mo la bzod pa de la 'dun pa bskyed nas ci zhig bya zhe na/_bag yod mgo la 'bar bzhin gnas par gyis/_/zhes gsungs pa ste/_mgo la 'bar ba bzhin zhes smos pa ni 'bad pa dang

[\[39a.3\]]spangs te/_ma chags pa dang /_zhe sdang med pa dang /_gti mug med pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan par gnas par gyis shig ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste/_chos bzhi po 'di dag la bag yod pa zhes ming du 'dogs pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ltar tshul 'chos byed kyi gzhi yin pa/_/zhes bya ba ni
[\[39a.4\]]gtan tshigs so/_/shes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed/_/ces bya ba ni dam bca' ba ste/_rnyed pa smos pas ni rdzas dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_'tsho ba log pa la sogs pa'i rnyed pa bsdu'o/_/tshul 'chos pa smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don te/_kha gsag la sogs
[\[39a.5\]]pa yang bsdu'o/_/gnas pa ni lhag par chags pa'o/_/'o na ji ltar 'tsho bar bya zhe na/_ngan ngon dag gis chog bya ste/_/zhes bya ba gsungs te/_rtswa dang /_lo ma dang /_chu la sogs pa ci yang rung ci rnyed pas chog par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/de lta bus ji ltar 'tsho bar nus she na/_bya dang

[\[39b.1\]]bar bya ste/_'khor ba na 'dris pa ma yin pa'i chos yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba rnyed pa ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir/_kye ma legs par rnyed do zhes gsungs so/_/thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas bskyed pa'i chags pa spang bar dka' ba'i phyir yang /_kye ma spangs so zhes gsungs

[\[40a.1\]]par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na sangs rgyas dang chos la gus par bya ba ni/_nan tan gyis bsgrub pa'i phyir te/_sangs rgyas bla mar gyis shig_/chos bla mar gyis shig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de ltar phan pa rnyed pa la sogs pas mir gyur

[\[40a.3\]]'di ltar rnyed pa 'dod pas sems g.yengs nas phan tshun 'gro ba la ni dran pa la sogs pa med par 'gyur zhing byang chub kyang ring bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa la sogs pa med pa yang re re nas rnyed pa yongs su spang ba'i rgyu yin no/_/yang na rnyed pa 'dod pa ni dran pa med pa kho na'i rgyu'o/_/de yang shes

[\[40b.1\]]ston pa nyes pa yi/_/ngo bo de nyid rnam gsum bstan/_/bstan par bya ba ni chos thams cad do/_/ston pa po ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'o/_/nyan pa ni gdul bya'i skye bo ste/_de yang byis pa dang /_mkhas pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so/_/de dag gi ngo bo'i de kho na ni phyin

[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]pa ste/_de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis la brten nas las dang rnam par smin pa dang /_las dang rnam par smin pa med pa dag gi de kho na shes pa de khong du chud pa'i phyir lnga par bzhed de/_ka zhes bya ba'i don khong du chud ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/las dang
[\[43a.2\]]rnam par smin pa med pa smos pa yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas gsungs te/_yang dag par na dgag par bya ba med pas/_dgag pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir de ni med pa kho na'o/_/yang na yang dag mi snang phyir/_/de gnyis ngo bo nyid med nyid/_/de ltar yang
[\[43a.3\]]dag don shes pa/_/khong du chud phyir lnga par bzhed/_/yang na gang gi phyir las dang rnam par smin pa dang las dang rnam par smin pa med pa gnyis yang dag par mi snang bas na/_ngo bo nyid med pa kho na yin pa de'i phyir/_ngo bo nyid med pa'o zhes de kho na nyid kyi don shes pa khong du chud pa'i
[\[43a.4\]]phyir lnga par bzhed do/_/de bstan pa ka zhes bya ba'i don khong du chud pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar te/_ji lta zhe na/_las dang rnam par smin pa dang /_las dang rnam par smin pa med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa zhes gsungs pa'o/_/gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyis/_/stong pa nyid la sogs pa yi/_/chos kyi dbyings ni 'di
[\[43a.5\]]shes pa/_/rtogs phyir drug pa 'dir bzhed do/_/chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi stong pa nyid la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi yin no snyam du shes pa gang yin pa de khong du chud pa'i phyir/_drug par bzhed de/_d+ha zhes bya ba'i don khong du chud ces bya ba'i
[\[43a.6\]]tha tshig go/_/stong pa nyid la sogs pa yang /_yang dag par dpyad na dgag par bya ba med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa kho na'o/_/yang na gzungs chos rnam grangs kyis/_/stong pa nyid la sogs pa nyid/_/chos dbyings yin par rnam shes pa/_/khong du chud phyir drug par bzhed/_/yang na
[\[43a.7\]]gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa gang yin pa de nyid chos kyi dbyings yin par shes pa gang yin pa de khong du chud pa'i phyir drug par bzhed do/_/stong pa nyid la sogs pa yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa kho na yin mod kyi/_'on kyang ngo bo
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]nyid la sogs pa la rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir/_yang dag pa'i kun rdzob la brten nas chos kyi dbyings zhes gsungs so/_/ngo bo nyid sogs rnam rtog pa/_/spangs pa'i thabs ni gdul rnams la/_/bstan par bya phyir mgon rnams kyis/_/stong nyid la sogs bstan pa
[\[43b.2\]]mdzad/_/rnam par rtog pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtog pa dang /_mtshan ma la rnam par rtog pa dang /_smon pa la rnam par rtog pa'o/_/de la ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtog pa ni gzhan gnyis kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/mtshan ma la rnam par rtog pa ni smon pa la rnam par rtog pa'i sngon
[\[43b.3\]]du 'gro ba ste/_de ltar 'di ni de'i gnyen po de dag gi go rims bstan pa yin te/_de bstan pa/_d+ha zhes bya ba'i don du khong du chud pa zhes pa dang sbyar te/_ji lta zhe na/_gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o/_/zhi gnas la sogs nyid yin zhes/_/chos
[\[43b.4\]]rnams thams cad mdor sdud de/_/de dag de bzhin nyid shes pa/_/khong du chud phyir bdun par bzhed/_/zhi gnas ni ting nge 'dzin to/_/sogs pa smos pas ni lhag mthong la sogs pa bsdu'o/_/lhag mthong ni shes rab ste/_chos thams cad ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang /_zhi gnas dang
[\[43b.5\]]lhag mthong ma yin pa nyid dam de dang ldan pa nyid do/_/de dag gi de bzhin nyid ni re zhig zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dag gi de bzhin nyid yin te gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/dgag par bya ba med na dgag pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ma yin pa dag kyang de dang
[\[43b.6\]]'dra'o/_/de bzhin nyid de shes pa gang yin pa khong du chud pa'i phyir bdun par bzhed de/_sha zhes bya ba'i don khong du chud ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/de bstan pa/_sha zhes bya ba'i don khong du chud pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro/_/ji lta bu'i tshul du zhe na/_zhi gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
[\[43b.7\]]pa'o/_/kun rdzob tu ni chos rnams kun/_/skad cig gang yin de dag ni/_/gzod nas zhi phyir don dam du/_/zad med la sogs bye brag bstan/_/ji ltar grags pa'i skad cig pa'i chos gang dag yin pa de dag rim pas dpyad na skad cig ma'i mi rtag pa'i phyir zad pa med pa'o/_/rgyun gyi mi rtag pa
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]med pa'i phyir 'jig pa med pa'o/_/rgyud kyi mi rtag pa med pa'i phyir rgyu ba med pa ste/_gang dag la 'gro ba med pa de dag ni rgyu ba med pa'o/_/'dir rgyun ni tshe gcig gi rgyun no/_/rgyud ni tshe du ma'i yin par bzhed do/_/ci'i phyir de dag rig pas dpyad na/_zad pa med pa la sogs

[\[44a.4\]]gsungs pa yin/_/mi rtag pa la sogs pa la gdul ba'i skye bo'i mngon par zhen pa rnam pa gsum yod de/_skad cig pa'i mi rtag pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /_dus gzhan gyi gnas skabs kyi mi rtag pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /_'khor ba ji srid du gnas pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong du
[\[44a.5\]]'jug pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/_/yang na khams gsum gyi bye brag la brten nas/_zad pa med pa la sogs pa'i bye brag go rims bzhin bstan te/_khams gsum pa la ma gtogs pa 'khor ba pa'i dngos po gzhan med la/_de yang tshul de lta bu yin pas de'i phyir de la mngon par zhen pa spong
[\[44a.6\]]ba'i phyir zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na gang gi phyir skad cig pa'i chos thams cad la brtags na/_skad cig pa'i mi rtag pa med pa'i phyir zad pa med la/_rgyun gyi mi rtag pa med pa'i phyir 'jig pa de'i phyir rgyu ba med de nyon mongs pa med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/de lta bu dag la nyon mongs pa
[\[44a.7\]]rnams kyis gnas mi thong pa'i phyir ro/_/zad pa med pa la sogs pa de dag nyid ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzod ma nas zhi ba'i phyir zhes gsungs pa'o/_/chos kun mya ngan 'das pa gang /_/de 'dir de bzhin nyid du bstan/_/'dir chos thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis mya ngan las 'das pa na/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa ni/_'dir de bzhin nyid yin par gsungs so/_/de la 'jug pa rtogs pa ste/_/de rtogs phyir na brgyad par bzhed/_/chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa de la 'jug pa ni rtogs pa'o/_/de rtogs pa khong du chud cing mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir brgyad par
[\[44b.2\]]bzhed de/_k+Sha zhes bya ba'i don khong du chud ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/de bstan pa/_k+Sha zhes bya ba'i don du khong du chud pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar te ji lta zhe na/_skad cig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o/_/'dis don rnams khong du chud par byed pas na don khong du chud pa ni rtogs pa'o/_/
[\[44b.3\]]de rtogs par bya ba ni mngon sum du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/des ni bsod nams skyed pa na/_/gzungs sam yang na yi ge yi/_/don la gang gis 'jug 'gyur ba/_/don rtogs de ni gsum du bstan/_/rnal 'byor pa de bsod nams skyed par byed pa na/_sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub
[\[44b.4\]]pa'i gzungs sam/_yi ge 'bru brgyad po 'di dag gi don la gzungs la sogs pa gang gis rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur ba gzungs la sogs pa'i don khong du chud pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gsum du bstan to/_/legs par bri ba ni rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te/
[\[44b.5\]]bsam pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_sgrub pas so/_/bsam pa yang byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba la sogs pa'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa du ma yod do/_/sbyor ba yang bkur sti dang /_kha zas dang /_sa phyogs gtsang ma dang /_nan tan du bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bye brag gis rnam pa
[\[44b.6\]]du ma yod do/_/sgrub pa yang yi ge gsal ba dang /_zur phyin pa la sogs par sgrub pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa du ma yod do/_/yang na legs par bri ba ni/_mdzes par bris pa ste/_byang chub yongs su bsngo ba la sogs pa'i bsam pas 'dri ba'i phyir ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i dge ba'i
[\[44b.7\]]chos 'phel bar byed pa'i sbyor bas 'dri ba'i phyir ro/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'dri ba ste/_yi ge'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'dri ba'i phyir ro/_/gzung ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_glegs bam dang /_tshig dang /_don dang /_de gnyi ga'o/_/klog pa ni bsam pa dang /_brjod pa'i sgo

[\[45a.1\]]nas rnam pa gnyis so/_/de la bsam pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i bsam pa dang /_yi ge la sogs pa la gtad pa'i bsam pa'o/_/brjod pa ni zur chag pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba ste/_rnam pa du ma yod par rig par bya'o/_/rjes su

[\[45a.4\]]kyi/_/gzungs ni bsod nams chung ngu yis/_/shin tu thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na rtag tu bkur ster byas la yun ring por rgyun du goms par byas pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba phyed phyed cing zhes bya ba'i tshig gis yin pa de ni bcom ldan

[\[45b.1\]]byas nas/_bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/bklags pas skyo bar gyur na rjes su dran par bya'o/_/des skyo bar gyur na/_yang bklag par bya'o/_/de lta bus nyin mtshan de 'da' bar bya'o/_/sbyin la sogs la zhus la sogs/_/yang dag dga' bya la sogs de/_/rtag bya de gzungs bdag med la/_/

[\[45b.6\]]'dzin du gzhug pa mtshon pa'i don du gsungs te/_des na yang dag par dga' ba la sogs pa gzhan yang bsdu ba lta bu dang /_dper na/_bklag par bya bas rjes su dran pa bsdu ba bzhin no/_/yang na/_gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la/_/zhugs par gyur la sogs pa dag_/yang dag

[\[46a.1\]]yang dag par dga' ba la sogs pa de'i yul bstan pa'i phyir yang yin par rig par bya'o/_/de la gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la legs par zhugs pa la sogs pa yang dag par dga' bar bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/yang na gzungs la gzud

[\[46a.3\]]yon gyi yul bstan pa'i phyir don khong du chud pa sngar bstan pa rnams yang dag par bzlas pa gsungs so/_/gnyis pas ni khong du chud pa bzhi po rnams kyi phan yon bzhi go rims bzhin du bstan to/_/yang na don khong du chud pa re re phan yon bzhi dang /_rigs pa bzhi smos pa yin te/_byang chub dang nye
[\[46a.4\]]ba la byang chub ni bla na med pa'o/_/shes rab rgya che ba la rgya che ba ni rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te/_yul las ni yul mtha' dag la khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/'bras bu las ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa rgya chen po'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/ngo bo nyid las ni shes rab kyi yon
[\[46a.5\]]tan ma lus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su slob par 'dod pas so/_/rigs pa rnam pa bzhi ji ltar smos she na/_'di ltar don de dag ni byang chub dang nye ba'i rgyu yin pa dang /_shes rab rgya chen po'i rgyu yin pa dang /
[\[46a.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'i rgyu yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su slob pa'i rgyu yin te/_'di lta bu gang yin pa de dag ni/_nges par nan tan du bsgrub par bya ba yin te/_dper na sbyin pa la sogs pa lta bu yin la/_de dang 'dra bar don rnam pa bzhi po ji skad
[\[46a.7\]]bstan pa 'di dag kyang de lta bu yin no/_/da ni gzungs kyi ngo bo 'thob par bya ba'i thabs la gnas pa'i phan yon bstan te/_bzhi tshan gsum gyis gzungs la ni/_/mngon par brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/thob bya ma thob par du yang /_/phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thob 'gyur/_/bzhi tshan

[\[46b.6\]]par 'gyur te/_rnam par sun 'byin pa kun spyod pa dang /_gnyen po kun du spyod pa dang /_sor chud par byed pa'i stobs dang /_rten gyi stobs te/_de skad du chos bzhi pa'i mdo las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de la rnam par sun 'byin pa kun du spyod pas ni las kyi sgrib pa de mjug 'joms par

[\[47a.1\]]ltar rten gyi stobs ni dge ba'i gshes gnyen la brten pa dang /_chos kyi de kho na la spyod pa ste/_de lta bas na rnam pa de dag gis las kyi sgrib pa byas shing bsags pa yang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rigs pa yin no/_/gzungs thob par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa ni

[\[47a.3\]]chos can yin te/_dper na me 'bar ba la sogs pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa yang 'grib pa dang 'phel ba can yin no/_/chud za bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni/_gnyen po bsgom pa med pa la bya bar shes par bya'o/_/de lta ma yin na ni rigs
[\[47a.4\]]pa dang 'gal ba dang /_mdo sde mang po dag dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/_/nges pa zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang de nyid kyis bstan to/_/ma nges pa ni gnyen po bsgom pa med bzhin du yang ji ste na 'bras bur mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang 'thob par 'gyur te/_spobs pa rgyun
[\[47a.5\]]mi 'chad pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis zil gyis mi non pa dang /_gong nas gong du spobs pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'o/_/gang gi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa de'i phyir bdud kyi las med do/_/bdud kyi las las ring bar gyur na las kyi sgrib pa bde blag tu 'byang
[\[47a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa byang na spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa thob par 'gyur te/_'di ni phan yon gyi rim pa yin no/_/don de yang tshigs su bcad pas gsungs te/_ci'i phyir bzlas te gsungs she na/_nges par gzung ba'i phyir te/_des ni 'di bstan te/_gzungs la mngon par brtson
[\[47a.7\]]pa thams cad kyi phan yon 'di dag nges pa kho na 'thob pa la bya'i/_kha cig la srid pa tsam gyi phyir phan yon du bstan pa ni ma yin no/_/yang na gang dag phan yon ston pa'i tshe ni ma 'dus la/_phyis lhags pa de dag gi ched du phan yon de tshigs su bcad pas brda sprad par mdzad de/_tshig dang

[\[52b.1\]]so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste/_des na chos kyi de kho na/_/bstan pa thabs dang bcas pa brjod/_/rgyu des brjod pa yin te/_chos kyi de kho na ni stong pa nyid do/_/thabs ni sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/_chos kyi de kho na thabs dang bcas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis

[\[86b.1\]]slar ni byon par mdzad gyur cig_/oM muHswA hAs gshegs par bya'o/_/smon lam gyi bye brag kyang gdab par bya'o/_/dus gsum bsags dang yod pa'i dge ba yis/_/bdag cag srid kun pha rol phyin nas ni/_/sems can kun bcas rin chen rtogs ldan pa'i/_/bla na

[\[87a.1\]]bstod/_/chu skyes nyi mar pha las 'khrungs/_/nam mkha'i mdog can g.yon brkyang tshul/_/mche gtsigs khro mo'i cha lugs 'dzin/_/stag gi pags pas rnam par dkris/_/ral gri zhags pa pad+ma mda'/_/'khor lo dbyig pa rtse gsum gzhu/_/g.yas dang

[\[87b.1\]]gsum rgyal ba'i bdag po khyod la bstod/_/nor bu'i snyan chas 'gro la chos sgra sgrogs/_/spyan gsum dus gsum shes dang shes bya mkhyen/_/'dzum pa'i zhal mda' 'gro ba'i don la dgyes/_/stong nyid thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/kun rdzob tsam du 'khor ba'i sdug

[\[88a.1\]]pa'i tshul ston don chen mdzad/_/skye med zhal mnga' srid gsum gzigs pa'i spyan/_/dbu rgyan rgyal ba'i cod pan 'chang la bstod/_/bden bzhi'i phyag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/snying rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren par mdzad/_/rtogs pa'i rdo rjes

[\[88b.1\]]ma/_/'phags lam don ldan ral gcig ma la bstod/_/khro rgyal kun 'dus dbu rgyan rin chen 'chang /_/bdud dgra kun 'joms khro mo'i cha lugs rdzogs/_/stag lpags sham thabs stobs bcu'i rtsal mnga' ba'i/_/rgyal ba kun skyed khro rgyal yum la bstod/_/skyon bral chu skyes gdung

[\[89a.1\]]gsum rtogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/thar par 'jug pa dbu mar grub pa dang /_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir/_/bdug spos sprin tshogs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod/_/don dam go bar mdzad ma khyod la bstod/_/mi shes mun pa lhag mthong gis 'joms

[\[89a.3\]]dri rab bsnams mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal bstod/_/snying rje chen pos 'gro ba kun bsdus nas/_/stobs bcu'i sa la kun tu dgod bya'i phyir/_/lcags kyu 'dzin cing zhi ba'i las mdzad ma/_/shar sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal/_/byams pa chen pos sdug bsngal kun bsal

[\[89b.1\]]thob pa des/_/rgyud lnga'i 'gro bas nyes pa kun spangs nas/_/mgon po 'od dpag med pa'i gnas thob shog_/'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bcu bdun la don rtogs kyi sgo nas bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba rdzogs so//[ {D2722}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/

[\[89b.7\]]su/_/'don zhing mchis pas bsal du gsol dang mgon po kye/_/lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams dang ni/_/dud 'gro dang ni dmyal ba yi dgas rnams su yang /_/sdug bsngal dang bcas 'gro ba gang gnas de dag la/_/bsrung ba mdzad ces khyod kyi lo rgyus bdag la khums/_/des na bdag la
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]thugs rje yang dag mdzad du gsol/_/g.yar lus dar la bab pa yal bar nyams la khad/_/de phyir ji srid dmyal ba'i gnas su ma zhugs par/_/bcom ldan khyod ni bdag gis zhu ba gsan par mdzod/_/gzhan yang gzhan don la ni rang nyid gshegs mdzad na/_/bsod nams
[\[90a.2\]]ma bsags bdag ni spyan sngar mchis kyang spong /_/khyod kyi thugs rje bsod nams dag la ltos sam ci/_/sdug bsngal med la snying rje bya bar su lags na/_/dran pa tsam gyis khyod ni yongs su mnyes nas su/_/sdig zad mdzad ces bdag gis ma khums lags sam ci/_/de phyir bcom ldan
[\[90a.3\]]gzhan phan mdzad la phul du byung /_/bdag 'dir ma dor bsrung dang bskyab pa mdzad du gsol/_/glang chen dag dang nor bu sras bcas btsun mo dang /_/gnod med rgyal srid khang bzangs rnam par bkra ba dang /_/sha dang rus pa dbu ni sku mtshal mthar thug btang /_/grub pa'i mig sman rkang
[\[90a.4\]]pa byug pa dag dang ni/_/grub pa'i gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mo dag kyang /_/'jig rten mnga' bdag khyod ni mnyes par gang su dag_/don gnyer rnams la mthar thug ma mchis sbyin par mdzad/_/gang dag rkang pa lag pa mig dang bral rnams dang /_/sna tshogs bro 'tshal gyis ni 'jigs
[\[90a.5\]]pa dang bcas rnams/_/yon tan zab mo khyod mnyes pa yis de dag gi/_/yan lag sobs 'gyur bro 'tshal dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur/_/mkha' lding sbrul gdug gnod dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/_/rnal 'byor ma yi gnod kun rtag tu zhi mdzad cing /_/rgyal ba khyod kyis gang la dgongs pa de la ni/_/
[\[90a.6\]]gshin rje'i pho nya rmi lam du yang mthong mi 'gyur/_/mgon po bdag ni 'jigs pas rnam par g.yengs pa yis/_/nyin dang mtshan du lag pa gyen du brkyang ste ngu /_/'jig rten dbang phyug des na bdag ni 'gums pa dang /_/nye ba lags na bcom ldan skyabs med 'bor ram ci/_/yul dang dbang po
[\[90a.7\]]gdul dka' sems kyang g.yo ba dang /_/mnyam par ma bzhag lus kyis sdig pa mang po bgyis/_/nyams pa bdag gi 'khor bzhin du ni skye ba 'dir/_/thams cad kyis ni sdig pa 'ba' zhig bsgrubs par zad/_/de phyir da ltar khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gang gis
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]ngan song sdug bsngal dag_/myong mi 'gyur bar khyod kyi spyan sngar bde 'gror ni/_/mchi bar bdag zhu 'di ni gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang rnam par 'joms pa'i sku/_/khyod ni 'khor ba'i mtsho chen gyi ni chu lon lags/_/khyod ni ltung bas skrag pa 'dren pa'i lag pa ste/_/
[\[90b.2\]]khyod ni brjed bcas mi dge 'dzin pa'i sgra gcan lags/_/khyod ni bde gshegs bla med de nyid ston pa po/_/khyod ni sdug bsngal mang ldan 'gro ba'i skyob byed yin/_/khyod ni yid 'joms gdul dka'i bdud las nges brgal ba/_/khyod ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal ba lags/_/khyod
[\[90b.3\]]ni nad pa ma lus nad ni rgyun gcod sku/_/khyod kyi sku ni 'gro ba'i nang na mchog tu mdzes/_/khyod ni dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho chen po ste/_/khyod ni rgyu med gnyen du 'gro ba rnams kyis rtogs/_/khyod kyis g.yo ba'i dbang po 'bad pa med par btul/_/khyod ni yul la chags pa yongs su bcom
[\[90b.4\]]pa lags/_/khyod kyi thugs ni bsam gtan mchog la mnyam par bzhag_/khyod kyi thugs ni slong ba kun la snyoms par mdzad/_/thugs rje ldan pa gzhan la phan par mdzad kyang ni/_/mi rig sbrul chen rgyab tu zhon nas yul rnams kyi/_/'dod pas dge ba nyams par gyur pa bdag la 'dir/_/
[\[90b.5\]]khyod ni gang gis yongs su dgyes par mi mdzad lags/_/khyod kyi spyan sngar g.yar chab 'byin cing smre ba yi/_/sdig ldan bdag la gang gis bsrung ba mi mdzad na/_/mgon po 'gro ba kun rten thugs rje gang lags pa/_/de ci khyod kyis nyi tshe ba ru bskyed lags sam/_/mgon po khyod kyi thugs
[\[90b.6\]]rjes nam mkha' khyab pa yi/_/sprin byung char pa'i rgyun ni chu dang skam dag dang /_/mthon dman yul ni kun la 'bab cing sems can gyi/_/don du kun la nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad du 'jug_/de ltar bcom ldan dran pa'i bdag gi bsod nams gang /_/des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mang ldan de dag gis/_/
[\[90b.7\]]'gro nang mdzes pa rnam mang rnam par rol pa yi/_/po ta la yi ri rtser gnas pa thob par shog_/'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba/_shar phyogs ba ren Da'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar shar phyogs ba ren Da'i
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]dzA ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las bsgyur ba//[ {D2723}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA kA ru NI ka sto tra tso da naM/_bod skad du/_thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskul ba/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs rje chags pas rnam gzigs
[\[91a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das/_/spyan ras kyis gzigs spyan zur bdag la gzigs/_/spyan zur gzigs pa tsam gyis 'gro rnams kyi/_/sdug bsngal nyam thag zhi mdzad khyod la mnga'/_/mtha' med g.yang sar lhung nas sa 'og gi/_/mun nag thibs por gtan du 'khyams pa bdag_/nyam thag
[\[91a.3\]]phongs pas thugs rje mchog sbyin cing /_/yongs su bskyab pa'i dus la di ring bab/_/sdug phongs gang gis nga ni dran byas na/_/de yi nyam thag nga yis bsal lo zhes/_/khyod kyis zhal bzhes mngon mdzad deng bdag gi/_/nyam thag bsal te 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/_/mthong dang
[\[91a.4\]]thos dang reg dang dran pa yis/_/nad gdon thams cad ngas bsal zhes gsungs pas/_/nad kyis gdungs pa'i 'gro ba bdag cag la'ang /_/mchog sbyin nyid kyis zhal bzhes ma bsnyel mdzod/_/'gro rnams gang dag sdug bsngal de dag gi/_/nyam thag kun tu bcad par bya'o zhes/_/

[\[91a.6\]]mthu ldan khyod kyi thugs rje'i blo gros kyis/_/lan la mi re bzhin du phan 'dogs la/_/bdag kyang khyod la skyabs su mchi bzhin du/_/sdug phongs 'di 'dra'ang mi gzigs kye ma'o brlag_/ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs gyur pa dang /_/ji lta ji ltar brten med phongs gyur pa/_/de lta de ltar khyod kyi

[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]skyes mchog khyod dran na/_/don med gyur pa sngon chad 'ga' ma mchis/_/sdug bsngal shin tu drag pos nyam thag 'dis/_/brlag la khad kyi mgon khyod bdag la dgongs/_/thugs rje'i gnas gyur sdug phongs ma lus pa/_/phongs pa thugs rje chen pos 'phrogs mdzad pa/_/khyod
[\[91b.2\]]kyis gal te bdag la ma gzigs na/_/bdag gi rten gzhan gang lags gsung du gsol/_/mgon po khyod la skyabs su mchi dgu la/_/mod la sdug bsngal ma zhi 'ga' ma mchis/_/bdag kyang skyabs su mchi yis brtse ba yis/_/sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di las bskyab tu gsol/_/
[\[91b.3\]]khyod kyi mtshan tsam grag la brten pas kyang /_/sdug phongs ma lus zhi bar 'gyur lags na/_/bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis ba/_/de 'dra'i thugs rje ci las gyur pa lags/_/khyod kyis grub brnyes bzhin du sems can rnams/_/yongs su bskyab phyir smon lam mdzad
[\[91b.4\]]lags na/_/bdag kyang sems can grangs las ma 'das pas/_/mchog sbyin bdag gi sdug bsngal dbrog tu gsol/_/nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun pa'i tshogs bcom bzhin/_/zla gsal dri med khyod ni rab bzhugs kyang /_/da dung bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis non cing /_/sdig pa'i mun pas
[\[91b.5\]]non pa skal chungs so/_/skye bo rnams kyis gang zhus skyong mdzad pa/_/de nyid bdag gis zhus bzhin mi gnang ba/_/mtshams las thar par skal ba med dam ci/_/shin tu ngan nam cir thal yi re mug_/mgon po khyod ni sems can phan pa'i phyir/_/thugs rje chen po ma spangs bzhin du yang /_/
[\[91b.6\]]sdug bsngal brnag dka'i rang bzhin gsol 'debs la/_/skyob pa mdun na gnas bzhin 'o dod 'bod/_/'jig rten skye bo'i pha ma'ang 'di ltar du/_/kha mchus btab par gyur kyang mi skyo bzhin/_/sems can phan brtson khyed la'ang 'khor ba nas/_/'khor ba'i tshe na bdag ni skyabs mchi
[\[91b.7\]]zhing /_/nag po'i las kyis nyin dang mtshan du ni/_/mngon par zil gyis non par gyur pa dang /_/sdug bsngal cher gdungs 'di las thar bya'i phyir/_/nyin rer 'o dod 'bod kyis ma skyo srungs/_/de ltar bdag gis bos shing smre ba yis/_/khyod thugs shin tu thugs rjes brlan gyur pa/_/

[\[92a.1\]]de ltar skye bo sdug bsngal brgyas gzir ba/_/kun la'ang srid bcom khyod ni dgongs mdzad cing /_/thugs rje'i dbang gyur thugs ni brtan pa yis/_/gzhan don 'ba' zhig lhur len yon tan ni/_/bla ma'i gnas gyur khyod ni sdug bsngal kun/_/'phrog pa'i nus mthu ldan

[\[92a.4\]]'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa zhes bya ba/_'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha dang lha min gyis ni zhabs btud cing /_/skye rga na dang 'chi ba rab bcom pa/_/'jig rten dbang byed bdag la skyabs mdzad na/_/brtse dang snying rje ldan pa skyong bar mdzod/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i

[\[92b.1\]]bar mdzod cig mgon po smre sngags 'don/_/lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams/_/dud 'gro dmyal ba yi dgas 'gro ba rnams/_/sems can nges gnas rtag par nyam thag gang /_/de rnams srung zhes khyed gtam bdag gis thos/_/des na bdag la snying rjer kun du mdzod/_/lus kyi lang

[\[92b.7\]]po/_/mi brtan lus kyis sdig pa mang byas shing /_/lto ba'i ched du 'khrul zhing 'bras bu med/_/bdag gi 'di ni skye bo thams cad lugs/_/gang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal ma myong bar/_/khyed kyi mngon sum du ni bzang 'gro ba/_/bdag 'dir thal sbyar rab btud bdag gi de/_/'jig

[\[93a.1\]]rten dbang phyug da lta nyid du mdzod/_/rmongs dang zhe sdang rnam par nyams pa'i rgyu/_/khyod ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i zam pa ste/_/g.yang sar lhung ba gyen du 'dren pa'i phyag_/khyod ni nyes lci'i mtshan mo'i sgra gcan nam/_/bde gshegs bla med bstan pa de kho na/_/khyod ni sdug bsngal
[\[93a.2\]]mang po'i sems can skyong /_/rgyal dka' yid dkrugs bdud las nges rgyal zhing /_/khyed ni srid pa'i mtsho las pha rol brgal/_/nad kun mtha' yas nges par gcod mdzad lus/_/khyed sku 'gro ba kun la mchog tu mdzes/_/dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das/_/khyod ni
[\[93a.3\]]rgyu med gnyen du skye bos shes/_/byed pa rnams bcom rol pa rig cing sgeg_/khyod ni yul la zhen pa yongs su bor/_/lha yi bsam gtan la ni sems mnyam gzhag_/khyod ni slong ba po la snyoms pa'i nor/_/thugs rje can khyod gzhan la phan mdzad kyang /_/kho bo 'dir ni srung ba
[\[93a.4\]]mi mdzad cing /_/gti mug lto 'phye chen pos sos btab la/_/yul la rlom sems pa yis dge las ltung /_/khyed kyi thugs rje gang de mtha' yas pa'i/_/skye bo kun la 'phro na gang gi phyir/_/sdig ldan bdag la srung ba mi mdzad pa/_/nges pa lags sam mdun nas dud mo 'byin/_/mgon
[\[93a.5\]]po khyed kyi brtse ba mkha' yangs su/_/sems can rnams la chu 'dzin sprin ji ltar/_/skam pa chu dang mtho dman yul mang por/_/ma lus rgyun tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab/_/de ltar bcom ldan dran pas bsod nams gang /_/des ni kho bos 'gro ba skyo med 'dir/_/po ta la ke g.yo ba med pa'i
[\[93a.6\]]gnas/_/rnam rol sna tshogs mdzes par skye bar gyur/_/zhes pa 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la/_tsar+ya dI pa zhabs kyis bstod pa rdzogs so//_//sgra mkhan chen po rgyal ba'i snyan gyi zhal snga nas/_lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal
[\[93a.7\]]bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//[ {D2725}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha pany+tsa de ba sto tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can sdug bsngal me tshogs kyis
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]gdungs la/_/thugs rje'i char rgyun bsil bas zhi mdzad cing /_/rang bzhin bde ldan gnas su 'dren mdzad pa/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs rje chen po'i zhags pas 'gro kun gyi/_/gnod pa nges sel bde la 'god mdzad cing /_/sna tshogs sbrul
[\[93b.2\]]pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/_/don yod zhags par grags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/_ma chags pad+ma'i rigs kyi sprul pa ste/_/klu rgyal tshul gyis gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/_/dbang chen bskal pa'i me ltar rab brjid 'bar/_/khro rgyal rta mgrin rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos nyid
[\[93b.3\]]spros bral ro gcig mngon gyur tshul/_/ral pa gcig 'chad lha mo'i skur ston cing /_/bgegs tshogs 'dul phyir khro mo'i cha lugs 'dzin/_/ral pa gcig ma khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i yon tan gzhir gyur cing /_/skal ldan rjes mthun 'gro don mdzad la
[\[93b.4\]]brtson/_/mgon po'i phrin las ma lus rdzogs mdzad ma/_/lha mo khro gnyer can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa/_paN+Di ta chen po e rab tis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang /_lo tsA ba ba ri rin chen grags
[\[93b.5\]]pas bsgyur ba'o//[ {D2726}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya tsar+p+ra Ti ru tsi ta sto tra~M`/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tsar+p+ra Tis bstod pa/_'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha mi lha min gyis ni zhabs la btud/_/skye rga na
[\[93b.6\]]dang 'chi ba rab tu bcom/_/thugs rje'i ngang can 'jig rten dbang po khyed/_/skyabs med bdag la snying rje mdzod cig kye/_/nyon mongs rlabs chen tshogs kyis 'joms byed cing /_/sna tshogs sgra sgrogs 'khor ba'i chu gter dbus/_/bying ba bdag ni zung la bsrung bar mdzod/_/brtse ba

[\[94a.1\]]chags stong phrag bsad/_/bdag gi sdig byas deng du mgon po yis/_/lus can skyon rnams ma lus nyams par mdzod/_/gang zhig 'tsho ba dang ni bkur ste'i phyir/_/bden min 'jig rten 'dod pa min pa smras/_/dmyal ba yun du goms pa'i smra ba can/_/de kun

[\[94a.3\]]dwags dmyal bar 'gro ba ni/_/gnas shing rtag tu gdung ba'i sems can gang /_/khyod ni de rnams bsrung zhes bdag la grags/_/de phyir gzhon nu nyid song lus la ni/_/thugs rje'i gzigs pa bdag gi steng spros zhes/_/dmyal bar zhugs pa min pa ji srid du/_/smra bar bgyid

[\[94a.6\]]dag khyod kyis byin/_/su zhig 'jig rten dbang po khyod mnyes byed/_/ri lu mig sman mchil lham grub pa dang /_/grub pa'i sman dang nor bu rnam dag sngags/_/gnod sbyin mo dang grong 'jug sgrub par byed/_/gang dag mig dang rkang lag smras pa yi/_/sna tshogs nad kyis 'jig rten
[\[94a.7\]]nyam thag pa/_/khyod mnyes na ni de rnams yongs rgyas lus/_/rnam sgeg nad med yon tan zab mor 'gyur/_/khyod dgyes gang lags rgyal 'gyur ga ru Da/_/gcan gzan gza' dang mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma/_/rtag tu zhi 'gyur de yi mdun du ni/_/gshin rje'i pho nya rgyu bar mi byed
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]do/_/'jig rten dbang phyug dgyes bzhin skyabs med bdag_/'dor ba ci zhes bcom ldan bdag smre ste/_/nyi ma so sor lag pa bsgreng byas nas/_/tshig 'khrugs pa yi skrag pa zhi bar mdzod/_/'khrugs pa'i lus kyis song ba'i skye bar bdag_/yul drug la ni dbang po g.yo ba'i yid/_/
[\[94b.2\]]sdig pa mang byas 'dir ni ma lus pa/_/dbyes pa'i rgyu yis 'khor zhing rnam par 'dzings/_/gang gis ngan song sdug bsngal ma myong bar/_/bde 'gror mngon sum 'gro de spyod kyis mdzod/_/deng bdag 'jig rten dbang la phyag dang zhing /_/sna tshogs thal sbyar 'di ni phyag gi'o/_/khyod ni rmongs
[\[94b.3\]]dang sdang ba 'jig pa'i rgyu/_/'khor ba'i chu gter chen po'i zam pa lags/_/ltung zhing skrag pa slong ba'i dpung pa khyod/_/sdig lci mtshan mor byed pa'i sgra gcan no/_/bla med bde gshegs kyis gsungs de nyid kyis/_/khyod kyis sems can sdug bsngal mang po bskyang /_/rgyal dka' yid
[\[94b.4\]]srubs bdud las khyod rgyal te/_/kun tu grol ba sred mtsho'i pha rol lo/_/nad kun gcod par mdzad pa khyod kyi sku/_/ma lus 'gro bar mchog tu lus mdzes pa/_/bcom ldan dpe med snying rje'i sin d+hu khyod/_/rgyu med gnyen du skye bo rnams la grags/_/rol pas dbang po 'joms shing rnam par
[\[94b.5\]]byed/_/khyod ni yul la kun nas chags pa 'dor /_/lha yi bsam gtan mnyam bzhag khyod kyi thugs/_/nor ni slong ba po dang thun mong lags/_/brtse ldan khyod ni gzhan la phan mdzad kyang /_/gti mug lto 'phye chen pos sos zin cing /_/yul la kun rtog dge ba las ltung ba/_/bdag ni
[\[94b.6\]]tshim par mi mdzad ci ltar lags/_/mtha' dag 'gro ba'i don bsten snying rje gang /_/khyod kyis spros de nges pa lags sam ci/_/khyod kyi spyan sngar sna tshogs sgra sgogs pa'i/_/sdig ldan bdag la gang las bsrung mi mdzad/_/mgon khyod snying rje nam mkha' las yangs te/_/sems can

[\[99a.4\]]yi/_/'od zer mchog tu rnam par rgyal bar gyur rnams khyed kyi srid pa myur du sel bar mdzad gyur cig_/nag mo dga' ba'i zla ba'i mdzes pa zil gyis non bgyid sa gzhi 'dzin pa kai la sha yi ni/_/snang ba rgyas pa gsal bar nyams shing dkar po nyid gyur kha ba can gyi dkar ba nyid kyang 'phrog_/
[\[99a.5\]]'o ma'i rgya mtsho rgyas pa lud pa dang mtshungs phyugs rnams kyi yang lha yi glang chen so rnams ni/_/bcag pa'i dum bu ltar mdzes 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs sen 'od zer rgyas pas khyed rnams srung gyur cig_/gang zhig yongs 'du'i me tog gis mchod mtsho skyes dpa' ni 'dzums shing bung ba'i tshogs
[\[99a.6\]]rnams gar sgyur bgyid/_/gang la gnas bzhin bsnyen bkur la chags pad+ma cung zad zum zhing rang byung 'dug pa dka' bar gyur/_/gang gis lha yi chung ma gdung ba'i skyon sel nyin mo'i dpal ni nag mo min par mtshan mor gyur/_/phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs sen zla ba mdzes pa dang ldan zla ba'i 'od 'dis
[\[99a.7\]]khyed rnams srung gyur cig_/lha yi na chung skye bo mdzes ma rnams kyis 'dod 'os su 'khrul mig tshugs lta zhing mchod gyur la/_/sen mo'i 'od gsal dkar zhing mdzes par gyur pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i tshogs pa lta bu 'dzin mdzad cing /_/mi chung 'dod pa rab rgyas 'dod ldan lta bur gzhan gyi dbang gyur
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]ma yi spyod la rab tu 'jug_/mi dman lha yi grong gi tsan+dan gyis byugs phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs kyis khyed rnams srung gyur cig_/kun dga'i khur bu mi dman rab rgyas lha yi lag pas yongs 'du'i me tog rab tu gtor rnams la/_/bung ba'i don mthun nag po brtsegs pa shin tu gnag par gsal
[\[99b.2\]]ba'i tshogs pa lta bu rab rgyas pa/_/phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs kyi mtsho skyes dag gi sen mo'i 'od ni dri med 'o ma'i chu gter gyi/_/dbus las 'khrungs pa'i dpal mo g.yo med dga' ba'i rgyu 'dis khyed kyi dge legs mchog tu sgrub gyur cig_/re ba rnam chad skyo bas 'phel ba'i me yi rtse mo gcod
[\[99b.3\]]pa'i chu chen rab tu rgyas gyur cig_/pad+ma mdzes pa'i rjes mthun gyis drangs sbrang rtsi byed pa'i sgrib byed rnams kyis bsgribs par gyur pa'i dpal/_/sen mo'i 'od zer dkar zhing rags la stug por gyur pas rang dgar khyab cing nang ni khengs gyur pa/_/sor mo chu skyes dpal la reg pa'i zhabs
[\[99b.4\]]kyis tshegs med ma chad khyed kyi 'dod pa sbyin gyur cig_/'khor lo'i 'od ni rab tu mdzes dang ldan gyur dri med sen mos bskyed pa do zla med pa'i dpal/_/mtshungs med yon tan grangs med bsod nams rnams kyis 'thob pa'i mtshan gyi tshogs ni rnam par 'dzin gyur cing /_/ma lus gling
[\[99b.5\]]rnams gsal ba'i mthu ldan shin tu che bar phun sum tshogs pas sa yi bdag po rnams/_/phyag bgyid mgo yi 'khor los sgyur ba dbu la sangs rgyas zhabs kyis khyed rnams yun ring srung gyur cig_/mtho ris gang gA'i gser gyi pad ljon me tog cung zad bye bas 'di la gtor ba'i yon tan
[\[99b.6\]]ci/_/gsal ldan mtsho skyes su 'khrul bung ba'i phreng bas glu dbyangs nyid la glu rnams kyis ni ci zhig bya/_/rab mdzes sen mo 'di la nor bu'i phreng ba rnams kyis mdzes pa nyid du bgyi bar nus min zhes/_/gang zhig mchod la lha yi dbang pos gsungs gyur phyag na chu skyes bsdams pa'i zhabs des rgyal
[\[99b.7\]]gyur cig_/gang zhig mgon po kho na'i bde bar gshegs pa'i rgyur gyur 'ba' zhig ma yin skye ba'i snod kyi yang /_/gang du pad+mo mngon 'dod sbrang rtsi 'thung ba'i tshogs nyid 'dab bskyod ma yin skye bo rnams kyi yang /_/gang gis rab lci sa nyid shin tu bla mar gyur cing 'dud rnyed ma yin 'jig rten
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]gsum po yang /_/dbu la bde gshegs ri bong 'dzin pa'i 'od kyis rnam par gsal ldan zhabs des 'jig rten srung gyur cig_/gang zhig sten byed bung ba rnams la btud pa'i sbyin pas dga' mgu rangs pa'i tshogs ni skyed mdzad cing /_/gang gi rtsa ba mi dman nges pa kho nar ljang gu
[\[100a.2\]]nyid min mchog tu mdzes pa nyer 'dzin la/_/rdul gyi tshogs rnams 'chi med mgor nyal dpal ni gnas pa'i sar gyur sen mo'i 'od zer bzhad pa yi/_/ge sar dang ldan 'jig rten mgon po'i zhabs kyi pad+mas khyed la yun ring dge legs sbyin gyur cig_/lus 'joms nyams byed 'jigs su
[\[100a.3\]]rung ba'i dgra 'joms sgrub pa lus can rnams kyi mtshon te 'dod pa yi/_/dngos grub 'bod par byed cing kye ma shin tu cher bsags mi bzad sdig pa'i tshogs chen zad mdzad pa/_/nyon mongs bkod pa dgra yi bsam pa'i sreg blugs kyis bskyed sdug bsngal me chen gyis ni bsregs pa dag_/
[\[100a.4\]]sel ba'i chu klung phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs kyi 'od kyis khyed kyi zer la rnam mang phan pa sgrub gyur cig_/dbu la sangs rgyas rgyan ldan zhabs kyi nye 'khor du rgyu tshad med pa yi pad+mor 'khrul ldan pa/_/bung ba'i phreng ba sgra snyan sgrogs pa rnams ni sems can bskyab sa'i bya ba gcig pur rab brtan la/_/
[\[100a.5\]]yun ring bzhugs par brtan par bgyi slad stobs chen snying rje dag gis sbom zhing gnag pa lcags kyi ni/_/lcags sgrog bkod pa lta bus khyed rnams dag gi phun sum tshogs pa nges par g.yo med sgrub gyur cig_/pad+ma'i nang gi 'dab ma'i phreng ba ltar mdzes 'jam zhing rdo rje lta bu sra la rnam par
[\[100a.6\]]brtan/_/gdug pa'i dgra rnams kyis ni rab tu bsnun byas mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams rnam par nyams par 'gyur ba'i sa/_/dmar zhing chags pa nye bar zhi ba 'khor ba'i chu gter dag las sgrol bar bgyid pa'i byed pa po/_/shin tu stobs ldan bde bar gshegs pa'i ri bong can 'dzin zhabs
[\[100a.7\]]kyis khyed kyi skyo ba sel gyur cig_/dbang po'i chu skyes rab tu rgyas shing mdzes pa'i tshogs la bung ba g.yo ldan yin yang mi g.yo zhing /_/kun du dga' ba'i kun+da 'phrog byed lag na gnas pa'i tshogs la sreg ldan yin yang mi sred de/_/mdun du khyab 'jug gis gtor mdzes ldan yongs 'du'i me
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]tog dri bzangs ldan la'ang dga' ba mi skye bar/_/gang du bung ba'i phreng ba dgar 'gyur rgyal ba 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma des khyed srung gyur cig_/'od zer rab tu mang ba'i tshogs las gyur pa'i ral pa g.yo zhing shin tu rab mdzes gsal ldan la/_/dmar zhing mdzes pas rtses 'brel rab tu
[\[100b.2\]]mtho ba sen mo'i so gtsigs kun nas mdzes shing yid du 'ong /_/nyes par zhugs pa'i gnyis 'thung dgra bo skrag bgyid ring du g.yo ba'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs gyur pa/_/pad skyes ral pa'i nags nyal 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs kyi seng ge khyed rnams zhi ba'i slad gyur cig_/shin tu dri ma
[\[100b.3\]]med kyang mi chung yang ba min yang myur du phyogs kyi sgo rnams 'god par bgyid/_/'jig rten gsum po kun du dga' bar bgyid kyang stobs ldan pha rol lus khyab yongs su gdung ba'i rgyu/_/mdzes sdug 'gyur byed byug par ldan yang phul byung yid 'ong rgyal ba'i 'od zer dag gis me
[\[100b.4\]]tog ni/_/rnam rgyas phreng ba'i thod can zhabs kyi 'od zer khyed rnams phongs pa'i zug rngu 'gog par mdzad gyur cig_/gang la rgyal po'i rgyal pos me tog rnams dang 'phrog byed kyis kyang yongs 'du'i ljon shing yid 'phrog rnams/_/zla bas kun dga' ldan par kun+da rnams dang nor lha'i rgyud
[\[100b.5\]]kyis 'od ldan nor bu mang po'i tshogs/_/zhabs ldan dga' bas pA la sha ste de ltar lha yi skye bos mchod pa'i khyad par rab mang rnams/_/rjes su khrid pa'i snyan ngag lta bus mchod bgyid phyag na chu skyes zhabs des khyed rnams srung gyur cig_/'od rnams rnam par gsal ba nyi mas bstod bgyis
[\[100b.6\]]sen mo rnams la mtho ris mgon po yis/_/sor mo'i rtse mo'i tshogs la dbang phyug 'dren byed rnam par mi g.yo mdzes pa'i mtha' la mthar byed kyang /_/lha yi 'jig rten rnams la gang gi thun mong min pa'i mdzes pa phul du byung ba'i yul rnams ni/_/ma lus mthong ba'i nus pa yod min mgo
[\[100b.7\]]la sangs rgyas gzugs kyis mtshan ma'i zhabs des rgyal gyur cig_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab gsal ral pa'i tshogs kyi rtsi shing ldan pa che ba'i sku/_/'khor ba'i chu gter gting du 'jug byed skye bo'i tshogs kyi shin tu lci ba'i sa gzhi rab gnon zhing /_/mtha' rnams
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]dag las yang dag byung ba yid 'ong zab cing dmar ba'i khams chen ldan pa'i chu rnams 'bab/_/grub pa'i don mthun gyis bsten pad+mo 'dzin pa ri bo'i zhabs ni khyed kyi bzang po'i slad gyur cig_/'khor ba'i lam la rab bgrod 'gro ba mtha' dag ngal zhing dub ldan zhi ba'i rgyu yi grib
[\[101a.2\]]bsil can/_/rab tu mdzes pa'i yal ga rang gsal sen mo'i me tog 'dzin cing 'dod don 'bras bu dang ldan pa/_/lha yi skye bos rab btud mgo yi phreng bas bskyor ba'i rtsa bar nor bu'i bum pa gang ba yi/_/dri med 'od kyi chus bran 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs kyi ljon shing tshogs kyis khyed rnams
[\[101a.3\]]srung gyur cig_/rtsa ba rab brtan nyon mongs tshogs pa'i dgra bo stobs ldan stobs rnams rtsad bcad rnyed pa chen po yis/_/rangs pa thob gyur rnam par sgeg ldan stobs ldan las rgyal mgo yi gnas la g.yo zhing rnam par rtse/_/chu skyes rgyas pa'i rgyun la chags shing kun du sred ldan dar der med
[\[101a.4\]]po rab tu sgrogs pa yi/_/bung ba'i tshogs pa mi bzlogs mtshungs med dri bral pad+ma 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyis khyed la srung gyur cig_/'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug dpal 'byor lag ldan chung ma g.yo ba'i sdom thag gdags sa'i dbyug pa ste/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal sbrul gdug sos
[\[101a.5\]]zin 'gyel ba'i 'gro ba mtha' dag skyong bar byed mkhas nam mkha' lding /_/mi chung dmyal ba'i grong khyer nang na bzlog dkar 'jug pa'i sgo sdom rab brtan srid pa'i chu gter ni/_/legs par rgal ba'i gdos pa gcig pu 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs ni khyed rnams 'byor pa'i slad gyur cig_/
[\[101a.6\]]'dun sa gang du lha yi rol mo mkhan rnams mdzes pas yid bzung mchod pa bgyid par mi nus te/_/gang rnams rnam pa las 'das sil snyan rig byed kha na ma tho med rnams de tshe rnam par nyams/_/dman pa min pa'i glu dbyangs mi len nyams rnams dag gis spras pa'i dngos po nyid min ngo bor gyur/_/
[\[101a.7\]]de ltas brgya phyin nang du bzhad gyur lta bas mi ngoms gzugs can mtsho skyes can des rgyal gyur cig_/dpal ldan par med rab tu mtshungs pa med cing cher gyur 'dod pa chen po'i khang pa mchog gi sar/_/lhag pa'i stobs ldan g.yon gyi rim par mi zad 'dus pa'i bdud kyi yid rnams rab
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]tu 'joms mdzad cing /_/sems can dga' bde rab bzhed grags pa dang ni 'jam pa'i thugs ldan ngal bas skyo bar mi 'gyur ba/_/mgo la 'od dpag med pas khyed kyi gti mug gis bskrun rab 'joms rgya che'i 'jigs pa 'joms gyur cig_/brtan pa'i ra ba 'jigs su rung bas bskor zhing sgra
[\[101b.2\]]ldan bcing pas dam bcings ring por gsal ba'i sgra/_/drag po shin tu 'jigs rung dmyal ba'i grong khyer nyid kyi rnam par 'dzin pa'i dgra bo rnams dag ni/_/btson khang nang du gdung ba drag pos shin tu 'jigs par gyur rnams dran nas skyabs la rab gshegs shing /_/bkur stir sgrub mdzad
[\[101b.3\]]snying rje rab lci 'jig rten dbang phyug gang yin de yis khyed rnams srung gyur cig_/bskal pa'i mtha' yis dba' rlabs ltar 'phyo g.yo ba'i rlung gi stobs kyis rab gtsubs dba' rlabs phreng ba rnams/_/sgra drag sgrogs shing thor thor dang ldan chu srin tshogs kyis gang ba 'jigs rung chu
[\[101b.4\]]yi chu gter ni/_/gang zhig dmigs pa nyid na mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i tshogs chen bkram pa rtse dga' dag gi gnas/_/nyams rab dga' bar 'grub 'gyur pad+mo can de shin tu myur bar 'gro rnams srung ba'i slad gyur cig_/du ba'i tshogs kyi 'ching bas bcings pas zla ba nyi ma'i 'od zer nyams shing
[\[101b.5\]]'bras bu med par byed/_/'gog pa bskyed pa'i bgegs la mkhas pa'i lha yi chung ma rnams kyang brten pa'i mthu rnams nyams 'gyur ba'i/_/du ba'i rgyal mtshan can yang gang gi ming brjod rgyun 'dzin 'dzin byed rnams la rab tu nyams 'gyur ba/_/sangs rgyas 'dzin pas khyed la nyams dgar rgyun chad
[\[101b.6\]]med cing sgrub byed dang bcas legs pa sgrub gyur cig_/khros pas rab bslang lag pa dus kyi mtshon cha dang 'dra 'jigs su rung ba'i phud ces sgrogs par byed/_/chang gis bsgos pa'i 'gram pa dag tu bung ba'i tshogs gtibs glo bur gnag gyur dar zhing che ba'i lus/_/lag ldan dbang po 'ong ba gang
[\[101b.7\]]gi mtshan gyi lcags kyu brnag dkas btab nas zhum zhing skrag 'gyur ba/_/'jig rten dbang po'i thugs rje rab 'dod yo byad de ni khyed kyi 'dod pa'i bya ba mdzad gyur cig_/phud ces dbugs ni 'jigs rung khro ba'i rang gnas za bas sreg byed mi chung dug gi du bar ldan/_/so yi bza' ba mthong bas mgo bo
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]shin tu rab tu gdengs gyur nyes byed so rtse ldan pa rnams/_/rang gi mtshan ni dug so dbang po'i dgrar gyur blo la rnam par bzhugs pas nus med nyams 'gyur ba/_/'jig rten dbang de kun gyi nyon mongs phung po shin tu mi bzad mngon gyur zhi ba'i slad gyur cig_/spos dris rab tu bslang ba'i
[\[102a.2\]]dregs pa che 'dzin glang chen tshogs rnams za bar sgrogs shing 'jigs pa'i shugs/_/khro bas rtse gcig tu 'gro mgrin pa'i phug zab dag nas drag po'i ngar sgra zab mo sgrogs byed pa'i/_/ri dgas dbang po 'khol byed kyis bkol 'os pa nyid du gang gi yon tan brjod pas ldan 'gyur ba/_/yan lag mchog
[\[102a.3\]]'thor bde gshegs gnas shing rnal 'byor ldan des khyed kyi ngan par 'brel pa sel gyur cig_/rab mang gnod pas rjes su dpag bya brtse ba zad pa'i snying ldan 'jigs pa sgrub par byed gyur pa/_/mkha' la gnas shing ri yis nye bar gzhal bya bung ba ma he mngon 'gyur 'od lta'i lus kyi tshogs/_/
[\[102a.4\]]sbyor thabs legs ldan sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu gang zhabs brjod pas dman zhing brtson 'grus med pa dang /_/rnam par nyams par bgyid ldan bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas des khyed rnams rnam par rgyal ba'i slad gyur cig_/glang chen tshogs kyi chu srin rab rgyu ral gri mdung rings 'od dang ldan
[\[102a.5\]]pa'i dba' rlabs 'khrug cing rgyug_/rab bslang dkar zhing g.yo ba'i tog gi dbu ba legs par gsal ldan skrag pa'i gnas kyi sar gyur pa/_/mtshungs med sgra rnams yang dag sgrogs pa'i sde brtan chu bo dag ni gang zhig brtan pa legs pa'i grus/_/spro ba dang bcas yang dag rgal gyur mtsho
[\[102a.6\]]skyes can des khyed kyi bde min bde bar sel gyur cig_/sa 'dzin tshogs rnams 'byed pa'i mthu ldan 'od zer rab mang 'byor ba'i 'od la spyod cing 'jigs byed pa/_/rab tu bkra ba'i me 'od rnam 'dzin 'jigs pas zil gnon 'byung po rnams ni rmongs shing 'khrul bskyed pa/_/rdo rje 'jigs
[\[102a.7\]]pa'i snod kyi mngon du lhung ba dag ni gang la gus pa'i mthu las myur nyid du/_/rnam par nyams pa'i sar 'gyur mdzes ldan mtsho skyes 'dzin pa de yis khyed kyi srid pa 'byed gyur cig_/kun tu gzir bas brten nyams 'pho ba'i sgrub byed nye gyur lha ngan khros pas kha rje zhan gyur pa/_/zug gzer
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]brnag dka' drag pos 'gog byed rnam pa sna tshogs mang po'i nad kyis rab tu gzir ba'i lus/_/gang gis bsam gtan nges brjod bdud rtsi 'dzin byed kyis bzung 'gro ba blo ldan zug rngus mi brdzi bar/_/lhag par dga' bskyed mgo la sangs rgyas de yis khyed rnams blo ni byang chub slad du srung gyur
[\[102b.2\]]cig_/ring nas 'khod bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bdag mtshungs med dgra rnams nyams shing rab tu gdung bar byed pa'i glu/_/drag tu len cing khrims lugs grags pa pha mes bdag po'i grags pa las rgyal khrims lugs dag dang ldan/_/'byor pa rnam kun brlag pa bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur khros
[\[102b.3\]]pa'i blo can gang zhabs brjod pa'i nus pa yis/_/mchog tu mdza' bar 'gugs byed rgyal ba'i khyu mchog gnas des khyed kyi 'jigs pa yang dag 'phrog gyur cig_/tshangs pa dman pa nyid gyur bla ma yang ni bla ma min dang ma nyams par brjod nyams pa nyid/_/khyab 'jug mi smra'i ngang tshul dbang
[\[102b.4\]]phyug kyang ni tshig rnams rnam par 'god pa'i khengs pa med gyur la/_/tshim zhing gsal bar bstod 'dod rnams kyang de ltar lha rnams gang gi yon tan brjod la mkhas min te/_/rgyal ba'i thugs kyi spyod yul nang gi yon tan tshogs mnga' phyag na pad+ma dag gis rgyal gyur cig_/yab kyis ya
[\[102b.5\]]mtshan la ste lha dgra'i dgra yis spyod pa dang ni mig gsum ldan pas mig dag la/_/rigs kyi dgra yis rigs la bla ma yis kyang gshegs pa la ste mtshan mo'i bdag pos sku la'o/_/grogs po yis ni byams pa la ste a tra'i bu yis 'gro kun bu ltar gyur pa'i mnyes gshin la/_/'di bstod
[\[102b.6\]]bstod pa'i snod gang mtha' yas sbyin mdzad phyag na chu skyes de yis khyed rnams srung gyur cig_/gang la tshangs pas rang gi zhal rnams mang po nyid las mang po legs par bzhad dang ldan pas bstod/_/kun dgas khengs shing phung pos kyang ngo glu rnams dag gi mgon pos kyang ni spyi bos
[\[102b.7\]]'dud par bgyid/_/brgya byin 'dren byed brgya phrag bcu rnams bsngags pa bgyid cing gang la rnam gzigs rgyun chad med par ni/_/'dren byed dga' bas phyag 'tshal bstod pa'i snod gyur 'jig rten gnyen des 'jig rten gsum rnams srung gyur cig_/pad+ma 'dzin pa'i gdung med rab
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]gsal 'jig rten pa rnams snang ba'i don du yod pa min nam zhes/_/mkha' yi lam la nyi ma'i 'gron po 'di ni ngal zhing snang byed 'od zer 'bras bu med par gleng /_/blo yi nor can blo ldan rnams kyis bstod pa bgyis pas 'dun sar rags pa'i snang ba sgrub byed la/_/gang gi bka' drin
[\[103a.2\]]myur du dgra rnams nyams par byed pa de las 'gro ba dge legs ldan gyur cig_/phyag 'os gang la phyag 'tshal bkod pa las kyang bsod nams snod rnams shin tu mtho ba nyid 'gyur la/_/thun mong min pa'i mchod 'os gcig pu mchod kyang gus pa'i snod rnams nye bar bsags pa shin tu mang /_/
[\[103a.3\]]gang gi bsam gtan gnas pa dran pa yis kyang 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dag ni 'phral la brjed 'gyur ba/_/mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab 'jig rten phan pa'i sgrub lam 'jig rten mgon des khyed rnams srung gyur cig_/dbang po'i rdo rje brdzun te lha yi dgra rnams nyams par gang gis byas shing stobs
[\[103a.4\]]ldan 'phrog byed ni/_/shin tu rno zhing yid 'phrog mngon par me tog mnga' can dag la me tog can ni 'bras bu med/_/khyab 'jug 'khor lo la ni 'khor lo don yod min zhes skye bo'i tshogs kyis nges par brjod ces nas/_/mtshon tshogs bzung ba med par dgra yi skye bo dga' bas bcom pa mtsho skyes ldan
[\[103a.5\]]pas rgyal gyur cig_/'jig rten 'das pa'i bde ba 'dzin par gyur kyang 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis sdug bsngal ldan/_/rtag tu rjes su chags pa btang bar gyur kyang skyabs med sdug pa'i srog chags gtong ba dag las grol/_/'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po nyid du gyur kyang mi mnyams
[\[103a.6\]]sreng ldan 'gro la brten zhing 'dud pa bgyid/_/mtshungs bral bsam yas spyod pa sgrub mdzad mgo la sangs rgyas gang des khyed rnams yun ring srung gyur cig_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'jig rten gsum du dpe med mnyes gshin snum blugs sbyor ba dag las zhi bar ni/_/gang zhig mi gshegs stobs ldan
[\[103a.7\]]mi chung mu stegs rlung 'tshubs dag gis rab tu rnam par mi g.yo zhing /_/gzhan phan rgyu la brtson pa rab brtan sdong bu mi nyams 'od zer dang ldan srid pa'i khang par ni/_/gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibs pa sel byed 'jig rten dbang po'i sgron ma de yis rgyal gyur cig_/gang du 'di ni kun la byams ldan
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]mi bzad mang por gyur pa'i nyon mongs dgra rnams ci la bsreg_/gang du grol bar nus pa'i mthu ldan snying rje'i zhags pa brtan pos g.yo ba med par ci la 'ching /_/gang du btang snyoms phyogs nyid la brten gzhan la phan par bgyid slad ci la 'khrug ste de yi phyir/_/rnam bkra ngo mtshar phyag na pad+ma'i spyod
[\[103b.2\]]pa 'gro las 'das pas khyed rnams dman las rgyal gyur cig_/kun la phan zhing kun gyi rang bzhin du gsal rgya che tshul ldan dus kun du ni kun gyi mgon/_/kun gyi don chen thams cad sgrub slad gang zhig 'dul ba'i sgrub byed rnam pa kun ni ster bar bgyi/_/bla mar gyur cing che ba'i yon tan kun gyis kun
[\[103b.3\]]las 'das shing khengs pa kun ni zhum par bgyid/_/kun ni kun la rab sbyin mgo la kun mkhyen des ni srid chen khyed rnams 'bras dang bcas gyur cig_/dbang po rje bo skye dgu rnams bdag 'chi med bla ma 'jig rten skyong ba dag dang dbang po che/_/'od ldan dang ni dgra thul dbyug pa gzhan
[\[103b.4\]]las rgyal ba'i stobs ldan las rgyal nor sbyin rgyal ba'i zhabs/_/don ldan ming gi snod ni rgyal ba nyid ces khong bshad kyis khengs 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa las/_/lha mi skye bo ngo mtshar gyur rnams gang la phyag bgyid phyag na chu skyes de yis rgyal gyur cig_/gtso bo 'phags pa rnams kyi mchog

[\[111a.1\]{D2733}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka ku bAkya sto trA d+hitiSh+ThA ta nA ma/_bod skad du/_thugs rje chen po la smre sngags kyis bstod pa byin rlabs can zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/_/
[\[111a.2\]]dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba/_/rnam dag 'od gsal zla ba'i dkyil ltar mdzes/_/ji ltar mkha' la nyi 'od stong 'bar bzhin/_/dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lham me ba/_/srid pa gsum gyi sa mkhan ston bar grags/_/khams gsum 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig
[\[111a.3\]]po/_/byams mgon thugs rje'i lha khyod bdag la dgongs/_/bdag ni thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas/_/lam log lam stor srid pa'i 'khor bar 'khyam/_sngon tshe las log sdig pa spyad pas nongs/_/sdig pa'i las rnams ci byas rab gnong 'gyod/_/dar zhing drag pa'i las de dbang btsan
[\[111a.4\]]pas/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying gyur te/_/zhe sdang 'bar ba'i me yis rang rgyud bsregs/_/gti mug mun pa'i tshogs kyis shes rgyud rmongs/_/'dod chags rgya mtsho'i nang du rnam shes bying /_/nga rgyal chen po'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan/_/phrag dog rlung dmar 'tshub mas 'khor bar
[\[111a.5\]]g.yengs/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa dam pos bcings/_/'dod pa me mdag dong 'dra'i 'obs su lhung /_/sdug bsngal drag po'i 'dam rdzab char ltar bab/_/me khams nyi ma'i dugs ni steng nas tsha/_/chu khams sa yi rlan ni 'og nas grang /_/phyi yi ser bu'i ngad ni thad nas tsha/_/kun nas
[\[111a.6\]]'khrugs pa'i rlung ni khong nas ldang /_/de lta'i sdug bsngal shin tu bzod dka' yang /_/sdom pa'i yi dam gzhig tu ga la rung /_/sdug bsngal kun dang bsdos nas sdom bsrung zhing /_/mos pa'i dad pas 'phags mchog mi 'dor na/_/'phags mchog 'gro don mi mdzad ci zhig dgongs/_/
[\[111a.7\]]byams mgon ci slad bdag la thugs mi brtse/_/bdag 'dra'i blun rmongs las ngan sdig po cha/_/las kyi dbang gis snyigs ma'i dus 'dir skyes/_/skyes pas 'gyod de las la yi re chad/_/yi chad 'gyod kyang las dbang bcos su med/_/las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i rgyun dang 'dra/_/las
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]dbang chu rgyun 'bog par shin tu dka'/_/bka' la zhugs kyang bka' bzhin rdo ma thogs/_/lus ngag yid gsum sdig pa'i dbang du song /_/sdig pa'i las dbang drag po'i me 'bar bas/_/rnam shes dbang po'i myu gu gdungs gyur te/_/phung po sgyu ma'i lus 'dis mi bzod na/_/byams
[\[111b.2\]]mgon thugs rje can gyis dgongs lags sam/_/nyi ltar 'od gsal zla ltar mdangs gsal ba'i/_/thugs rje'i zhal nyid blta bar 'tshal lags na/_/thog ma med nas ma rig ling thog gis/_/ldongs pa'i chu bur mig gis ma mthong na/_/'gro ba'i mgon khyod nga lta ga na bzhugs/_/sdug
[\[111b.3\]]bsngal drag po shin tu mi bzod pa/_/shin tu skrag cing skyi g.ya' rab 'jigs nas/_/dung dung gdungs pa'i smre sngags 'di 'don cing /_/nyam thag phongs pa'i da ros 'o dod 'bod/_/byams mgon thugs rje can gyis gsan lags sam/_/nam zhig 'chi 'pho lus sems brje ba'i tshe/_/gnyen
[\[111b.4\]]bshes grogs dang phral te gshin rjes khrid/_/de tshe 'jig rten nye dus mi stongs te/_/las kyi dbang gis bdag rang gcig pur khrid/_/dus der bdag la mgon skyabs ma mchis na/_/byams mgon khyed kyis 'khor bar bdag gtong ngam/_/las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra ba/_/thog
[\[111b.5\]]ma med pa'i dus nas lam log pas/_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las ma thar te/_/bskal pa dpag med skye ba ji snyed du/_/sngon chad lus blangs grangs med zhig gyur te/_/sha rus bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam/_/rnag khrag bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam/_/las 'phro
[\[111b.6\]]bsags na bsam 'das brjod mi la/_/khams gsum bgrang zhing skye ba mang brgyud kyang /_/byas pa'i las rnams don med chud re zos/_/skye ba grangs med ji snyed de tsam la/_/skye ba gcig gis kho na tsam gyi las/_/bla med byang chub don du rab 'bad na/_/de tsam byas pa'i las la'ang don re yod/
[\[111b.7\]]las ni dbang btsan nyon mongs stobs che bas/_/sha khrag 'dus pa'i lus blangs 'khor bar 'khyams/_/sdug bsngal drag pos srid pa'i btson rar tshud/_/mi bzod sdug bsngal drag po 'di myong na/_/nyes byas thams cad rang gi las las byung /_/byams mgon thugs rje can gyis
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]bzod lags sam/_/thugs rje chen pos ngan song rgyun gcad de/_/nyon mongs las kyi rlung ni zlog tu gsol/_/nyon mongs las kyi rlung ni dbang btsan nas/_/ma rig mun pa'i gling du gtan 'khyams na/_/ye shes sgron me'i zer gyis mi gzigs sam/_/nyes byas las kyi 'bras
[\[112a.2\]]bu mi bzod na/_/thugs rje can khyod phrin las mi mdzad dam/_/dug gsum bzod dka'i nad kyis gdungs lags na/_/thugs rje thabs mkhas sman gyis mi gso 'am/_/phyin ci log gi g.yang sar lhung lags na/_/thugs rjes myur mgyogs phyag gis mi 'dzin nam/_/sdug bsngal drag

[\[322a.1\]]cad bcom ste 'bras bu mi 'byin par byed do/_/yang gzhan gyi mi dge ba'i las 'jig par 'dod na de'i rim pa 'di yin te/_dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs su zhi ba'i las dang mthun pa'i thab khung du bud shing brtsig ste/_rang lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas der me

[\[322a.4\]]dang bcas pa bris nas grog mkhar dang tshwa sgo can dang 'jug ngogs dang shing rkang gcig gi sa dur khrod kyi thal ba dang lhan cig sprus pa las gzugs brnyan byas pa'i snying gar bcug ste/_rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang mdun du lhag pa'i lha gsal bar dmigs nas/_rnam par spros pa'i pho
[\[322a.5\]]nya'i tshogs kyis bkug cing bcug ste/_'tshe zhing dum bur gtub ba dang bsreg cing thal bar byed pa la dmigs nas sngags brjod pa dang bcas pa'i yungs kar gyis brabs pa'i mthar sbyin sreg bya ste/_thal ba rlung la phyar na gang la dmigs pa'i gdon de rlag par byed pa la the tshom med do/_/

[\[322a.7\]]nang du'ang lhag pa'i lha gsal bar dmigs la gzungs kyi bzlas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar chu'i ngo bor bsams pas lus bkrus te/_sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa'i sa rdza na'i bdug pa byin na gdon gyis bzung ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'byung po dgug par 'dod na smad 'tshong

[\[322b.1\]]gi ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas sngar bstan pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar nu tA A kAR+Sha ya dzaHzhes pa'i spel tshig dang bcas pa bris nas grog mkhar la sogs pa'i sa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar bcug ste/_maN+Dal gyi steng du bram ze'i thod par gzhag la/_rang lha'i rnal 'byor du

[\[323a.1\]]'bras bu des 'byin par byed do/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par 'dod na gnas dben par maN+Dal gyi steng du lhag pa'i lha'i sku gzugs bzhugs la/_de'i drung du rin po che'i snod du dngos grub kyi rdzas bzhag nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/_mdun du
