[\[326a.1\]]rdo rje'i rwa sogs bsam/_/bar chad bgegs kyis mi tshugs so/_/rnam 'joms yang snying dri chab kyis/_/'byor pa bsangs te skad cig gis/_/mchod pa dag par bya phyir brlab/_/de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la/_/sangs rgyas gnyis dang 'jigs byed drug_/de la yid kyi las
[\[326a.2\]]kun bya/_/rang bzhin rnam dag sngags kyis ni/_/nyams dang stong pa'i ye shes bya/_/rin chen khang pa yid 'ong ste/_/rdo rje'i brag tu rnam par bsam/_/der ni lha chen drag por bya/_/bdag nyid 'jigs pa'i nga rgyal gyis/_/shAkya seng ge 'khor bcas la/_/gsol gdab rdo rje'i
[\[326a.3\]]bsam gtan gnyis/_/'dres byas 'dres pa stong pa na/_/rdo rje'i rnam par bsam sngags brjod/_/bdag don rdo rje stong pa'i lha/_/de nas gzhan don yi ge ste/_/thog med las ni gsal ba ste/_/de la yig gnyis sngo spras pa/_/nus ldan yi ge'i lha yin no/_/de la rdo rje
[\[326a.4\]]sngags kyi sgra/_/stong pa mtshon byed khams rnams su/_/dam pa gnyis byas de la bstim/_/de ni sgra'i lha zhes bya ste/_/de gyur dam pa kun thim pas/_/rdo rje nyi ma la gnas pa'i/_/phyag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag_/stobs chen khro bo 'jigs cha byad/_/sngo nag rdo rje sdigs mdzub
[\[326a.5\]]can/_/ral pa la sogs kun ldan pas/_/'byung po bsdigs pa gzugs brnyan tshul/_/'di ni gzugs kyi lha zhes grags/_/de nas de ni gsal brtan phyir/_/ri bo 'bigs pa'i phyag rgya dang /_/rdo rje yan lag 'bar ba yi/_/sngags kyis spyi bo sogs bzhag pas/_/
[\[326a.6\]]gtsug tor la sogs grub cing bsrung /_/de yang phyag rgya'i lha ru bstan/_/de nas dus ni thams cad du/_/de dang mi 'bral kun byed pa/_/mtshan ma'am rnam rtog lha zhes gsungs/_/ye shes lnga dang sku gsum dang /_/don gnyis grub cing 'od dang ni/_/rdzu 'phrul nus pa
[\[326a.7\]]ston byed pas/_/lha zhes shAkya mchog gis gsungs/_/de nas bum pa mi dmigs las/_/rin chen khang par 'dam skyes bzhi/_/ge sar sogs la bsil rdo rje/_/rdo rje man ngag ldan par bsam/_/dbus su sprin sgra gyur pa las/_/phyag na rdo rje thugs kyi mchog_/rdo rje rnam
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]'joms khro bo ni/_/bdag mtshungs las kyi rdo rje la/_/zla ba med pa bsnams pa'o/_/de yi mdun du mA ma kI/_/sngo zhing dga' ldan ut+pal sngo/_/dam tshig rgyas 'debs bsnams pa'o/_/dran pa bzhi las byung ba ni/_/kun kyang rim min cig car ro/_/shar lho rdo rje kI la ni/_/sngo dmar
[\[326b.2\]]'jigs pa kun ldan la/_/rdo rje phur bu g.yas na ste/_/g.yon pa kun ni bsdigs par mdzad/_/lho nub rdo rje be con te/_/sngo nag rdo rje be+e con no/_/nub byang rdo rje tho ba ste/_/sngo skya de bzhin 'jigs pa la/_/rdo rjes mtshan pa'i tho ba ste/_/byang shar rdo rje gtum po ni/_/mig sman mdog
[\[326b.3\]]'dra rdo rje ni/_/rtse gcig bsnams pa rab tu bsgom/_/kun kyang tsham ngam bdud bzhi 'joms/_/de rnams ye shes lnga ldan rigs/_/dbu la mi bskyod mgon po ni/_/ral pa'i thor tshugs bzhad khro ba/_/dpa' bo dag la rnam par gsungs/_/de nas 'od zer 'gugs byed kyis/_/
[\[326b.4\]]'og nas 'khor bcas spyan drangs nas/_/rig pa rig ma dam tshig can/_/dpag med byon gyur mi 'chi ba/_/thugs ka nas bton des bskrad bcad/_/de la rang sngags bskul bcas kyis/_/mchod yon bzang po nyer bstan pa/_/mi shigs phyag rgya rang sngags lngas/_/so so la ni
[\[326b.5\]]gnyis med zhugs/_/phyogs skyong 'khor gyi phyi rim du'o/_/de nas dam tshig bstan bya'i phyir/_/de bzhin mi phyed khros pa yis/_/rigs kyi yum gyis rgyas btab pas/_/de yang rig pa rnam pa gnyis/_/mtha' med par du zhugs phyir ro/_/bdag ni dam tshig ldan pa las/_/ye

[\[346b.5\]]pas bsreg par bya'o/_/phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sngags kyis yungs kar la sogs pa bsreg par bya'o/_/yang snying gis ni bye ma rnams kyis gdab par bya'o/_/yam shing ni gdug pa'i shing la bya ste/_khro bo'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o/_/de ltar phul nas gtor ma gtang ste/_thal bas
[\[346b.6\]]mnan par bya'o/_/de ltar sbyin sreg rdzogs nas mnan par bya'o/_/nag po'i thod par che ge mo'i gzugs gcer bu dbyangs yig dang /_gsal byed phyin ci log gis gnas brgyad du dzaHbrgyad kyis bskor ba'i gzugs/_mi gtsang ba'i skud pas byang du bcug la thod par gzhug go_/phur bu bcus
[\[346b.7\]]gdab par bya'o/_/thun la sogs pas gdab par bya'o/_/de ltar byas nas mchod rten kun nas zlum pa'am/_khru gsum gang yang rung ba sum brtsegs byas la/_'og rnams la rdo rje gsum bri bar bya'o/_/bum pa'i nang du sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang /
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]yang snying 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa la bris pa gzhug go/_/rab tu gnas par bya ba'i phyir sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni/_bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog mthing nag_/sbrul gsum gyis brgyan cing rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa/_shin tu khro ba cig bsgoms
[\[347a.2\]]la/_thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du hUM bsgoms nas/_ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba la sogs pa byas la bsgom pa ni/_oM na maH tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye hUM zhes 'bum mam sa ya bzlas par bya'o/_/de ltar rdzogs nas rab tu gnas par bya ba ni/_maN+Dal sngon por
[\[347a.3\]]me tog sngon po gcal du bkram ste/_pU dza ci 'byor pa yang bshams la/_sku'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la brten nas bsgrub par bya'o/_/de ltar rdzogs nas mchod rten hUM nag po las rdo rje rgya gram gyi steng du mchod rten 'khor lo sum brtsegs pa'i rnam pa can
[\[347a.4\]]bskyed la/_'khor lo dang po la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la khro bo bzhi dang bcas pa/_bar du hUM ka ra la phyogs kyi khro bo bzhi/_'og gi stobs po che la mtshams kyi khro bo bzhi ste/_lha bco lnga'i rnam par bsam pa'o/_/de nas bdag nyid rdo rje gtum por bsams la/
[\[347a.5\]]des ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te bstims pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la de bsgoms nas/_sku'i gsang sngags phrin las bzhi dang /_de las sna tshogs te sprul pa'i las bya'o/_/thugs kyi sngags ni sku gdung byin gyis brlab pa'i ched du bzlas
[\[347a.6\]]so/_/gsung gi sngags ni bdag nyid do/_/de ltar dang po gcad mnan bzlog pa'i las bya'o/_/thod pa dang bcas pa mnan cing bskor bar bya'o/_/dam pa'i gdams ngag la brten nas/_/rgyud don zab mo'i lam 'di sbyar/_/nyes pa khyed la bzod par 'bul/_/'di brtsams
[\[347a.7\]]sems can bde thob shog_/rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs/_slob dpon chen po dngos grub brnyes pa'i sa ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//bal po'i paN+Di ta de ba pUr+Na ma ti dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//_//
